  <style type="text/css">
   /* HEADINGS ETC. */
		a,
		.container-fluid h1, 
		.container-fluid h2, 
		.container-fluid h3, 
		.container-fluid h4, 
		.container-fluid h5 {
			color:#ffffff !important;
		}
		a:hover,a:active {
			color:#f7f7f7;
		}
		.section-title {
			border-bottom: 2px solid #ffffff;
		}
		.subheader {
			color:#f7f7f7		}

		/* HEADER */
		.header-sub {
            background: linear-gradient(90deg, #ffffff 10%, #ffffff 90%);   
		}
		.header-mob {
	       background: linear-gradient(90deg, #ffffff 10%, #ffffff 90%); 
		}
		
		/* PARTNERS */
		.partners {
            background: linear-gradient(90deg, #ffffff 10%, #ffffff 90%);			
		}
		.partners h2, 
		.partners h3, 
		.partners h4, 
		.partners h5 {
			color:#00c1d5;
			border-color:#00c1d5;
		} 
		.partners.white_bg {
			background:#fff;
		}
		.partners.white_bg h2, 
		.partners.white_bg h3, 
		.partners.white_bg h4, 
		.partners.white_bg h5 {
			color: #ffffff;
			border-color: #ffffff;
		}
		/* GRADIENT BLOCKS */
		.gradient-bg {
			background: linear-gradient(90deg, #ffffff 10%, #ffffff 90%);
			color:#fff;
		}
		.gradient-bg h1,
		.gradient-bg h2,
		.gradient-bg h3, 
		.gradient-bg h4,
		.gradient-bg h5,
		.gradient-bg a {
			color:#00c1d5;
			border-color:#00c1d5;
		}
		.gradient-bg .btn {
			color: #00c1d5;
			border: 2px solid #00c1d5;
		}

		/* HERO */
		.hero {
			background-image: url('../img/glider.jpg');
		}
		.hero-content h1, 
		.hero-content a, 
		.hero-content-mob h1 {
			color:#00c1d5 !important; 
		}
		.hero-content-mob p {
			color:#00c1d5;
		}
		.hero-content {
			color:#00c1d5;
		}
		.hero-content .btn, 
		.hero-content-mob .btn {
			border:2px solid #00c1d5;
			color:#00c1d5 !important;

		}
		.navbar-header a {
			color: #00c1d5; 
		}
		.hero .copyright {
			color: #f0f0f0;
		}
		.hero-content-wrapper {
			background: rgba(255,255,255,0.6);
		}
		.hero-content-mob {
			background: linear-gradient(75deg, #ffffff 10%, #ffffff 90%);   
		}

		/* NAV */
		.container-fluid .nav>li>a:hover, 
		.container-fluid .nav>li>a:focus,
		.container-fluid .nav li a:hover, 
		.container-fluid .nav li a:active, 
		.nav li a:focus {
			background:rgba(255,255,255,0.2);
		}
		.icon-bar {
			background: #00c1d5;
		}
		.top-nav {
			background: #f7f7f7;
		}
		.container-fluid .nav .open>a,
		.container-fluid .nav .open>a:hover,
		.container-fluid .nav .open>a:focus {
			background:rgba(255,255,255,0.2);
		}
		.top-nav .nav li a,
		.top-nav .navbar-brand {
			color:#00c1d5 !important;

		}
		.top-nav .container-fluid .nav li a:hover {
			color:#00c1d5;
		}
		.top-nav .dropdown-menu .active a,
		.top-nav .dropdown-menu .active a:hover {
			background: #efefef;
		}
		.dropdown-menu, .dropdown-menu li:active,
		.dropdown-menu li.current-menu-item,
		.dropdown-menu, .dropdown-menu li {
			background: #efefef;
		}
		.top-nav .dropdown-menu li a:hover,
		.top-nav .dropdown-menu li:active a:hover {
			color:#00c1d5 !important;
		}

		.btn.btn-primary {
			background-color:#ffffff;
			color:#00c1d5 !important;
		}
		.btn.btn-primary:hover {
			background-color:#f7f7f7;
		}
		footer {
			background: #00c1d5;
		}
		.nav .open a {
			background: #f7f7f7;
		}
		@media only screen and (max-width: 767px) {

			.top-nav .dropdown-menu {
				background: #efefef;
			}
			.top-nav .dropdown-menu li a {
				background:transparent;
			}
		}

		/* Product title */
		.product-title__secondary-title {
			color: #ffffff;
		}
  </style>

         Admission
        </a>
       </li>
       <li class="page_item page-item-103">

         Admission requirements
        </a>
       </li>
       <li class="page_item page-item-109">

        </a>
       </li>
       <li class="page_item page-item-115 current_page_item">
        <a aria-current="page" href="https://www.secclo.eu/admission/how-to-apply/">
         How to apply
        </a>
       </li>
       <li class="page_item page-item-127">
        <a href="https://www.secclo.eu/admission/selection-of-second-year-specialization/">
         Selection of second-year specialization
        </a>
       </li>
       <li class="page_item page-item-121">
        <a href="https://www.secclo.eu/admission/selection-results/">
         Selection results
        </a>
       </li>
      </ul>
     </img>
    </div>
    <div class="col-md-8 content">
     <h2>
      How to apply
     </h2>
     <div class="subheader">
     </div>
     <p>
      <span style="color: #ff00ff;">
       The information below applies to 2024 application round which ended on 4 January 2024. There will be no student intake in 2025.
      </span>
      <span style="color: #ff00ff;">
       Please see
       <a href="https://www.secclo.eu/admission/admission/">
        here
       </a>
       for further information.
      </span>
     </p>
     <p>
      <span style="color: #808080;">
       Follow these six steps during SECCLO’s admission process. Note that you can complete the first two steps before our application period begins.
      </span>
     </p>
     <ol>
      <li>
       <span style="color: #808080;">
        <strong>
         Study our admission requirements
        </strong>
       </span>
      </li>
      <li>
       <span style="color: #808080;">
        <strong>
         Prepare for the admission
        </strong>
       </span>
       <ol>
        <li>
         <span style="color: #808080;">
          Take a language test (if required)
         </span>
        </li>
        <li>
         <span style="color: #808080;">
          Start collecting your application documents
         </span>
        </li>
       </ol>
      </li>
      <li>
       <span style="color: #808080;">
        <strong>
         Fill in and submit the online application
        </strong>
       </span>
      </li>
      <li>
       <span style="color: #808080;">
        <strong>
         Submit
        </strong>
        <strong>
         your language test scores
        </strong>
        (if required)
       </span>
      </li>
      <li>
       <span style="color: #808080;">
        <strong>
         Monitor your e-mail
        </strong>
        for our message and complement your application (if required)
       </span>
      </li>
      <li>
       <span style="color: #808080;">
        If your application is eligible,
        <strong>
         wait for the selection results to be published
        </strong>
       </span>
      </li>
     </ol>
     <p>
      <span style="color: #808080;">
       See below for further information on each step.
      </span>
     </p>
     <p>
      <img alt="" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-4642" data-pagespeed-url-hash="2308976257" decoding="async" height="100%" onload="pagespeed.CriticalImages.checkImageForCriticality(this);" sizes="(max-width: 1200px) 100vw, 1200px" src="https://storage.googleapis.com/secclo-production/2020/10/cb050bf9-secclo-students-23_photo-igor-vaisanen_kasakkamedia.jpg" srcset="https://storage.googleapis.com/secclo-production/2020/10/cb050bf9-secclo-students-23_photo-igor-vaisanen_kasakkamedia.jpg 1200w, https://storage.googleapis.com/secclo-production/2020/10/cb050bf9-secclo-students-23_photo-igor-vaisanen_kasakkamedia-300x181.jpg 300w, https://storage.googleapis.com/secclo-production/2020/10/cb050bf9-secclo-students-23_photo-igor-vaisanen_kasakkamedia-768x463.jpg 768w, https://storage.googleapis.com/secclo-production/2020/10/cb050bf9-secclo-students-23_photo-igor-vaisanen_kasakkamedia-1024x617.jpg 1024w, https://storage.googleapis.com/secclo-production/2020/10/cb050bf9-secclo-students-23_photo-igor-vaisanen_kasakkamedia-700x422.jpg 700w, https://storage.googleapis.com/secclo-production/2020/10/cb050bf9-secclo-students-23_photo-igor-vaisanen_kasakkamedia-640x386.jpg 640w" width="100%"/>
     </p>
     <h3>
      <span style="color: #808080;">
       Step 1 – Study our admission requirements
      </span>
     </h3>
     <p>
      <span style="color: #808080;">
       Before you begin the application process, check your compliance with our
       <a href="https://secclo.eu/admission/admission-requirements/" style="color: #808080;">
        admission requirements
       </a>
       .
      </span>
     </p>
     <h3>
      <span style="color: #808080;">
       Step 2 – Prepare for the admission
      </span>
     </h3>
     <p>
      <span style="color: #808080;">
       If an
       <a href="https://secclo.eu/admission/admission-requirements/" style="color: #808080;">
        English language test
       </a>
       is required from you and you have not taken the test yet,
       <strong>
        book a seat for it immediately. Applications without a valid English test result are not eligible and will not be processed further
       </strong>
       .
      </span>
     </p>
     <p>
      <span style="color: #808080;">
       Start collecting your
       <a href="https://secclo.eu/admission/application-documents/" style="color: #808080;">
        application documents
       </a>
       .
      </span>
     </p>
     <h3>
      <span style="color: #808080;">
       Step 3 – Fill in and submit the online application
      </span>
     </h3>
     <p>
      <span style="color: #808080;">
       <strong>
        A link to the online application portal can be found below during the application period. The online application form is open 22 November 2023 at 9 am (GMT +2) – 4 January 2024 at 3 pm (GMT +2).
       </strong>
      </span>
     </p>
     <p>
      <span style="color: #808080;">
       Late applications will not be accepted so be sure to submit your application before the application deadline. Before submitting the application, check it carefully as it is not possible to return to edit it after submission.
       <strong>
        <br/>
       </strong>
      </span>
     </p>
     <p>
      <span style="color: #808080;">
       In the online application form, you will be asked about:
      </span>
     </p>
     <ul>
      <li>
       <span style="color: #808080;">
        personal and contact information,
       </span>
      </li>
      <li>
       <span style="color: #808080;">
        previous higher education,
       </span>
      </li>
      <li>
       <span style="color: #808080;">
        motivation for the SECCLO studies (i.e. motivation letter),
       </span>
      </li>
      <li>
       <span style="color: #808080;">
        course descriptions of relevant courses taken, and
       </span>
      </li>
      <li>
       <span style="color: #808080;">
        the scholarships you want to apply for (incl. Erasmus Mundus scholarships).
       </span>
      </li>
     </ul>
     <p>
      <span style="color: #808080;">
       In addition, you are asked to upload your
       <a href="https://secclo.eu/admission/application-documents/" style="color: #808080;">
        application documents
       </a>
       to the application portal. Please note the
       <a href="https://www.secclo.eu/admission/admission/" style="color: #808080;">
        separate deadlines
       </a>
       given to language test results and recommendation letters.
      </span>
     </p>
     <p>
      <span style="color: #808080;">
       The application phase is conducted fully online. You do not need to mail us any application documents.
      </span>
     </p>
     <details>
      <summary>
       <span style="color: #808080;">
        Uploading instructions
       </span>
      </summary>
      <p>
       <span style="color: #808080;">
        The application portal supports the following file formats: .pdf, .png, .jpg and .jpeg, out of which
        <strong>
         .pdf is preferred especially for educational documents
        </strong>
        (degree certificates and transcript of records). For the educational documents, we ask you to scan the colour copies of the original documents.
       </span>
      </p>
      <p>
       <span style="color: #808080;">
        Be sure to include all pages of documents that contain any type of text/writing, even if it is on a back page. This is especially important for educational documents. Make sure that everything in the document is visible and readable on the scan.
       </span>
      </p>
      <p>
       <span style="color: #808080;">
        Documents that are in the same category (for example, a transcript of records that has four pages) should be scanned into
        <strong>
         one
        </strong>
        file. Please do not make a separate file for each page.
       </span>
      </p>
     </details>
     <details>
      <summary>
       <span style="color: #808080;">
        Application portal browser support
       </span>
      </summary>
      <p>
       <span style="color: #808080;">
        SECCLO’s application platform requires a modern browser. We recommend the latest version of Google Chrome as it ensures the best performance and security. The application platform also supports Mozilla Firefox, Apple Safari, Opera, and Microsoft Edge. While these browsers will allow you to run the application platform without problems, you may encounter performance issues or occasional glitches.
       </span>
      </p>
      <p>
       <span style="color: #808080;">
        Supported browsers are: Google Chrome 84+, Mozilla Firefox 78+, Apple Safari 12+, Opera 66+, Microsoft Edge 44+.
       </span>
      </p>
     </details>
     <p>
     </p>
     <h3>
      <span style="color: #808080;">
       Step 4 – Submit your language test scores (if required)
      </span>
     </h3>
     <p>
      <span style="color: #808080;">
       If an official English language test result is required from you, how you submit the test result depends on the test taken. All language test results are verified. Only the language tests listed at
       <a href="https://secclo.eu/admission/admission-requirements/" style="color: #808080;">
        Admission requirements
       </a>
       ->
       <em>
        Requirements for English language proficiency
       </em>
       are accepted
       <em>
        .
       </em>
      </span>
     </p>
     <p>
      <span style="color: #808080;">
       <strong>
        The final deadline for the English language test result to be received by the SECCLO Admissions Office is 18 January 2024.
       </strong>
       There are no exceptions to this deadline.
      </span>
     </p>
     <p>
      <span style="color: #808080;">
       See below for further information (click to open).
      </span>
     </p>
     <details>
      <summary>
       <span style="color: #808080;">
        IELTS
       </span>
      </summary>
      <p>
       <span style="color: #808080;">
        Upload a scanned copy of the
        <strong>
         IELTS Test Report Form (TRF)
        </strong>
        to the application portal. If you have taken the IELTS Indicator test, upload a document indicating your IELTS Indicator Score ID.
       </span>
      </p>
      <p>
       <span style="color: #808080;">
        <strong>
         If you receive your IELTS score after you have submitted your online application,
        </strong>
        please send your Test Report Form by email to
        <a class="mgd_spmspn" href="mailto:secclo@aalto.fi" style="color: #808080;">
         secclo@aalto.fi
        </a>
        . In addition, send your electronic test report to Aalto University in the test administrator’s service.
       </span>
      </p>
      <p>
       <span style="color: #808080;">
        For more information on the IELTS tests, please see the
        <a href="https://www.ielts.org/" rel="noopener noreferrer" style="color: #808080;" target="_blank">
         IELTS website
        </a>
        (ielts.org).
       </span>
      </p>
     </details>
     <details>
      <summary>
       <span style="color: #808080;">
        TOEFL
       </span>
      </summary>
      <p>
       <span style="color: #808080;">
        <strong>
         TOEFL test results must arrive to SECCLO Admissions Office directly from the test administrator (ETS)
        </strong>
        . Only official test scores sent by the test administrator are accepted.
       </span>
      </p>
      <p>
       <span style="color: #808080;">
        Request your official score report to be sent from the test administrator to Aalto University reporting code
        <strong>
         7364
        </strong>
        (
        <em>
         Score Report Recipient
        </em>
        ). If a department code is compulsory, you can choose any of the departments available. We receive the results from the test organizer via ETS® Data Manager.
       </span>
      </p>
      <p>
       <span style="color: #808080;">
        <strong>
         The scores are usually available within 1 to 2 weeks from sending the score report request
        </strong>
        . For your TOEFL test result to be accepted, the result must reach Aalto University via ETS on 18 January 2024 at the latest.
       </span>
      </p>
      <p>
       <span style="color: #808080;">
        <strong>
         If you receive your TOEFL score after you have submitted your online application,
        </strong>
        in addition to requesting the result via ETS to Aalto University, please inform us (
        <a href="mailto:secclo@aalto.fi" style="color: #808080;">
         secclo@aalto.fi
        </a>
        ) of your TOEFL iBT Appointment number by email.
        <strong>
         <br/>
        </strong>
       </span>
      </p>
      <p>
       <span style="color: #808080;">
        For more information on the TOEFL tests, please see the
        <a href="https://www.ets.org/toefl" rel="noopener noreferrer" style="color: #808080;" target="_blank">
         ETS website
        </a>
        (ets.org).
       </span>
      </p>
     </details>
     <details>
      <summary>
       <span style="color: #808080;">
        C1 Advanced or C2 Proficiency
       </span>
      </summary>
      <p>
       <span style="color: #808080;">
        <strong>
         Log into the language test administrator’s service and share your test results to Aalto University
        </strong>
        . In addition, upload a copy of your C1 Advanced or C2 Proficiency results report to your application form and inform us of your test taker’s ID number (e.g. ABC1234567), Reference number (e.g. 173YU0034522) and Statement of results number. The results are verified electronically.
       </span>
      </p>
      <p>
       <span style="color: #808080;">
        <strong>
         If you receive your C1/C2 test score after you have submitted your online application,
        </strong>
        share your test results to Aalto University and send your test taker numbers and a scanned copy of your results report by email to
        <a class="mgd_spmspn" href="mailto:secclo@aalto.fi" style="color: #808080;">
         secclo@aalto.fi
        </a>
        .
       </span>
      </p>
      <p>
       <span style="color: #808080;">
        For more information on the C1/C2 tests, please see their websites at cambridgeesol.org (
        <a href="https://www.cambridgeenglish.org/exams-and-tests/advanced/" rel="noopener" style="color: #808080;" target="_blank">
         C1 Advanced
        </a>
        ,
        <a href="https://www.cambridgeenglish.org/exams-and-tests/proficiency/" rel="noopener" style="color: #808080;" target="_blank">
         C2 Proficiency
        </a>
        ).
       </span>
      </p>
     </details>
     <details>
      <summary>
       <span style="color: #808080;">
        Pearson Test of English
       </span>
      </summary>
      <p>
       <span style="color: #808080;">
        PTE test scores are sent via the test administrator’s electronic service.
        <strong>
         Log in to your PTE account and send your results to Aalto University in the test administrator’s service
        </strong>
        . In addition, add your Score Report Code to the application form. The Score Report Code contains 10 characters that are letters and numbers. The code can be found at the top of the report under the name of the test taker.
       </span>
      </p>
      <p>
       <span style="color: #808080;">
        <strong>
         If you have already submitted your online application,
        </strong>
        send your results to Aalto University in the test administrator’s service and inform us (
        <a class="mgd_spmspn" href="mailto:secclo@aalto.fi" style="color: #808080;">
         secclo@aalto.fi)
        </a>
        on your Score Report Code by email.
       </span>
      </p>
      <p>
       <span style="color: #808080;">
        For more information on how to deliver your PTE results, please see the
        <a href="https://pearsonpte.com/" rel="noopener" style="color: #808080;" target="_blank">
         PTE Academic
        </a>
        website (pearsonpte.com).
       </span>
      </p>
     </details>
     <p>
     </p>
     <blockquote>
      <p>
       <span style="color: #808080;">
        If you have followed these instructions, you have now applied to SECCLO and we will process your application. What happens next?
       </span>
      </p>
     </blockquote>
     <h3>
      <span style="color: #808080;">
       Step 5 – Monitor your e-mail for our message and complement your application (if required)
      </span>
     </h3>
     <p>
      <span style="color: #808080;">
       After you submit your online application, SECCLO Admissions Office at Aalto University will check it. Submitted online applications are checked in order of arrival.
      </span>
     </p>
     <p>
      <span style="color: #808080;">
       After this general eligibility check, SECCLO Admission Office will send you an e-mail with one of the following messages (click for further information):
      </span>
     </p>
     <details>
      <summary>
       <span style="color: #808080;">
        Your application fulfils our general eligibility requirements and proceeds to the academic evaluation
       </span>
      </summary>
      <p>
       <span style="color: #808080;">
        If you have received this email, please note our policy on complementing your eligible application with additional documents:
       </span>
      </p>
      <ul>
       <li>
        <span style="color: #808080;">
         <em>
          Until application deadline
         </em>
         : it is possible to add documents to your SECCLO application. Please email them to us (
         <a class="mgd_spmspn" href="mailto:secclo@aalto.fi" style="color: #808080;">
          secclo@aalto.fi
         </a>
         ).
        </span>
       </li>
       <li>
        <span style="color: #808080;">
         <em>
          After application deadline, 4 January 2024 at 3pm
         </em>
         (GMT +2): Complementing your SECCLO application is no longer possible. The only exception are recommendation letters (separate deadline on 18 January 2024).
        </span>
       </li>
      </ul>
     </details>
     <details>
      <summary>
       <span style="color: #808080;">
        Your application is incomplete and does not currently fulfil our general eligibility requirements. It will not be processed further unless you complement it
       </span>
      </summary>
      <ul>
       <li>
        <span style="color: #808080;">
         <strong>
          Missing compulsory documents
         </strong>
         : The deadline for complementing your application with missing compulsory documents will be either the SECCLO application deadline (4 January 2024) or – if it is less than one week away – an individual deadline given to you. The individual deadline given will always be
         <strong>
          one week
         </strong>
         from the date your online application was checked. Please note that the same deadline applies to additional application documents. Please email us (
         <a class="mgd_spmspn" href="mailto:secclo@aalto.fi" style="color: #808080;">
          secclo@aalto.fi
         </a>
         ) any missing compulsory documents so that we can add them to your application.
        </span>
       </li>
       <li>
        <span style="color: #808080;">
         The recommendation letters have a separate deadline, 18 January 2024.
        </span>
       </li>
       <li>
        <span style="color: #808080;">
         <strong>
          Missing English language test result
         </strong>
         : The final deadline for the English language test result to be received by the SECCLO Admissions Office is 18 January 2024 (see
         <em>
          Step 4
         </em>
         above). The same deadline applies to all applicants.
        </span>
       </li>
      </ul>
     </details>
     <details>
      <summary>
       <span style="color: #808080;">
        Your application is not eligible and it will not be processed further
       </span>
      </summary>
      <p>
       <span style="color: #808080;">
        For SECCLO’s general eligibility requirements, please see
        <a href="https://secclo.eu/admission/admission-requirements/" style="color: #808080;">
         here
        </a>
        .
       </span>
      </p>
     </details>
     <ol>
      <li style="list-style-type: none;">
      </li>
     </ol>
     <p>
      <span style="color: #808080;">
       Be sure to follow your e-mail during this time and add “Secclo Erasmus Mundus” to your approved senders*! You should, however, also make sure that you have followed all of our instructions before you submit the application.
      </span>
     </p>
     <p>
      <span style="color: #808080;">
       *) Monitoring your email (incl. spam/junk mail folder) remains on the applicant’s discretion and SECCLO accepts no responsibility for admission emails not received due to the email settings of the applicant.
      </span>
     </p>
     <h3>
      <span style="color: #808080;">
       Step 6 – If your application is eligible, wait for the selection results to be published
      </span>
     </h3>
     <p>
      <span style="color: #808080;">
       The academic evaluation of the eligible SECCLO applications means that the academic staff of all six SECCLO consortium universities evaluates the applications and makes the final selection and scholarship decisions. This will take place in January-February 2024 and the selection results will be published in February-March 2024.
      </span>
     </p>
     <p>
      <span style="color: #808080;">
       <strong>
        We will inform all eligible applicants about the selection results by e-mail
       </strong>
       . The admission letters and all practical instructions will be sent to the selected students soon after.
      </span>
     </p>
     <p>
      <span style="color: #808080;">
       <strong>
        Rectification request
       </strong>
       : after the selection results have been published, the applicant has the possibility to request for rectification if they believe that there has been an error in the decision-making process. Applicants cannot appeal against the scholarship decision. The rectification request should be submitted to the SECCLO Consortium (secclo@aalto.fi) within 14 days after the publication of the selection results. All rectification requests against the selection decisions are processed by Aalto University. You cannot submit any new documents to support your rectification request.
      </span>
     </p>
     <blockquote>
      <h4>
       <span style="color: #808080;">
        Good luck during the admission process!
       </span>
      </h4>
     </blockquote>
    </div>
   </div>
  </section>

  <style type="text/css">
   /* HEADINGS ETC. */
		a,
		.container-fluid h1, 
		.container-fluid h2, 
		.container-fluid h3, 
		.container-fluid h4, 
		.container-fluid h5 {
			color:#ffffff !important;
		}
		a:hover,a:active {
			color:#f7f7f7;
		}
		.section-title {
			border-bottom: 2px solid #ffffff;
		}
		.subheader {
			color:#f7f7f7		}

		/* HEADER */
		.header-sub {
            background: linear-gradient(90deg, #ffffff 10%, #ffffff 90%);   
		}
		.header-mob {
	       background: linear-gradient(90deg, #ffffff 10%, #ffffff 90%); 
		}
		
		/* PARTNERS */
		.partners {
            background: linear-gradient(90deg, #ffffff 10%, #ffffff 90%);			
		}
		.partners h2, 
		.partners h3, 
		.partners h4, 
		.partners h5 {
			color:#00c1d5;
			border-color:#00c1d5;
		} 
		.partners.white_bg {
			background:#fff;
		}
		.partners.white_bg h2, 
		.partners.white_bg h3, 
		.partners.white_bg h4, 
		.partners.white_bg h5 {
			color: #ffffff;
			border-color: #ffffff;
		}
		/* GRADIENT BLOCKS */
		.gradient-bg {
			background: linear-gradient(90deg, #ffffff 10%, #ffffff 90%);
			color:#fff;
		}
		.gradient-bg h1,
		.gradient-bg h2,
		.gradient-bg h3, 
		.gradient-bg h4,
		.gradient-bg h5,
		.gradient-bg a {
			color:#00c1d5;
			border-color:#00c1d5;
		}
		.gradient-bg .btn {
			color: #00c1d5;
			border: 2px solid #00c1d5;
		}

		/* HERO */
		.hero {
			background-image: url('../img/glider.jpg');
		}
		.hero-content h1, 
		.hero-content a, 
		.hero-content-mob h1 {
			color:#00c1d5 !important; 
		}
		.hero-content-mob p {
			color:#00c1d5;
		}
		.hero-content {
			color:#00c1d5;
		}
		.hero-content .btn, 
		.hero-content-mob .btn {
			border:2px solid #00c1d5;
			color:#00c1d5 !important;

		}
		.navbar-header a {
			color: #00c1d5; 
		}
		.hero .copyright {
			color: #f0f0f0;
		}
		.hero-content-wrapper {
			background: rgba(255,255,255,0.6);
		}
		.hero-content-mob {
			background: linear-gradient(75deg, #ffffff 10%, #ffffff 90%);   
		}

		/* NAV */
		.container-fluid .nav>li>a:hover, 
		.container-fluid .nav>li>a:focus,
		.container-fluid .nav li a:hover, 
		.container-fluid .nav li a:active, 
		.nav li a:focus {
			background:rgba(255,255,255,0.2);
		}
		.icon-bar {
			background: #00c1d5;
		}
		.top-nav {
			background: #f7f7f7;
		}
		.container-fluid .nav .open>a,
		.container-fluid .nav .open>a:hover,
		.container-fluid .nav .open>a:focus {
			background:rgba(255,255,255,0.2);
		}
		.top-nav .nav li a,
		.top-nav .navbar-brand {
			color:#00c1d5 !important;

		}
		.top-nav .container-fluid .nav li a:hover {
			color:#00c1d5;
		}
		.top-nav .dropdown-menu .active a,
		.top-nav .dropdown-menu .active a:hover {
			background: #efefef;
		}
		.dropdown-menu, .dropdown-menu li:active,
		.dropdown-menu li.current-menu-item,
		.dropdown-menu, .dropdown-menu li {
			background: #efefef;
		}
		.top-nav .dropdown-menu li a:hover,
		.top-nav .dropdown-menu li:active a:hover {
			color:#00c1d5 !important;
		}

		.btn.btn-primary {
			background-color:#ffffff;
			color:#00c1d5 !important;
		}
		.btn.btn-primary:hover {
			background-color:#f7f7f7;
		}
		footer {
			background: #00c1d5;
		}
		.nav .open a {
			background: #f7f7f7;
		}
		@media only screen and (max-width: 767px) {

			.top-nav .dropdown-menu {
				background: #efefef;
			}
			.top-nav .dropdown-menu li a {
				background:transparent;
			}
		}

		/* Product title */
		.product-title__secondary-title {
			color: #ffffff;
		}
  </style>

    <div class="col-md-8 content">
     <h2>
      Selection of second-year specialization
     </h2>
     <div class="subheader">
      <p>
       All SECCLO students take their first-year studies at Aalto University.
      </p>
     </div>
     <p>
      Applicants may indicate their preferences for the second-year specialization in the online application form. At the admission phase, however, the student is only admitted to the first-year university, Aalto University. There is a separate application and selection process for the second-year specialization.
     </p>
     <p>
      <img alt="" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-634" data-pagespeed-url-hash="2647505825" decoding="async" onload="pagespeed.CriticalImages.checkImageForCriticality(this);" sizes="(max-width: 2667px) 100vw, 2667px" src="https://storage.googleapis.com/secclo-production/2018/10/263d2c79-301435_aalto_secclo_liikkuvuuskuva_bigger-font.jpg" srcset="https://storage.googleapis.com/secclo-production/2018/10/263d2c79-301435_aalto_secclo_liikkuvuuskuva_bigger-font.jpg 2667w, https://storage.googleapis.com/secclo-production/2018/10/263d2c79-301435_aalto_secclo_liikkuvuuskuva_bigger-font-300x211.jpg 300w, https://storage.googleapis.com/secclo-production/2018/10/263d2c79-301435_aalto_secclo_liikkuvuuskuva_bigger-font-768x541.jpg 768w, https://storage.googleapis.com/secclo-production/2018/10/263d2c79-301435_aalto_secclo_liikkuvuuskuva_bigger-font-1024x721.jpg 1024w, https://storage.googleapis.com/secclo-production/2018/10/263d2c79-301435_aalto_secclo_liikkuvuuskuva_bigger-font-700x493.jpg 700w, https://storage.googleapis.com/secclo-production/2018/10/263d2c79-301435_aalto_secclo_liikkuvuuskuva_bigger-font-640x451.jpg 640w, https://storage.googleapis.com/secclo-production/2018/10/263d2c79-301435_aalto_secclo_liikkuvuuskuva_bigger-font-1600x1127.jpg 1600w" width="100%"/>
     </p>
     <h4>
      Student selection to the second-year university
     </h4>
     <p>
      SECCLO students apply for their second year specializations during their first year of studies. The SECCLO Consortium decides on the selection to the second year specializations. The selection is based on the student’s preferences, the seats available at each university, and the suitability of the student to the chosen specialization. The Consortium partner universities ensure that all eligible SECCLO first-year students will be designated a second year university.
     </p>

			background: #f7f7f7;
		}
		.container-fluid .nav .open>a,
		.container-fluid .nav .open>a:hover,
		.container-fluid .nav .open>a:focus {
			background:rgba(255,255,255,0.2);
		}
		.top-nav .nav li a,
		.top-nav .navbar-brand {
			color:#00c1d5 !important;

		}
		.top-nav .container-fluid .nav li a:hover {
			color:#00c1d5;
		}
		.top-nav .dropdown-menu .active a,
		.top-nav .dropdown-menu .active a:hover {
			background: #efefef;
		}
		.dropdown-menu, .dropdown-menu li:active,
		.dropdown-menu li.current-menu-item,
		.dropdown-menu, .dropdown-menu li {
			background: #efefef;
		}
		.top-nav .dropdown-menu li a:hover,
		.top-nav .dropdown-menu li:active a:hover {
			color:#00c1d5 !important;
		}

		.btn.btn-primary {
			background-color:#ffffff;
			color:#00c1d5 !important;
		}
		.btn.btn-primary:hover {
			background-color:#f7f7f7;
		}
		footer {
			background: #00c1d5;
		}
		.nav .open a {
			background: #f7f7f7;
		}
		@media only screen and (max-width: 767px) {

			.top-nav .dropdown-menu {
				background: #efefef;
			}
			.top-nav .dropdown-menu li a {
				background:transparent;
			}
		}

		/* Product title */
		.product-title__secondary-title {
			color: #ffffff;
		}

    <div class="col-md-8 content">
     <h2>
      Selection results
     </h2>
     <div class="subheader">
      <p>
       SECCLO had its first student intake in 2018.
      </p>
     </div>
     <h3>
      2024 student intake
     </h3>
     <h4>
      First application round (22 November 2023 – 4 January 2024)
     </h4>
     <ul>
      <li>
       A total of 1192 online applications were submitted before the application deadline.
      </li>
      <li>
       Out of them, 910 applications were eligible and proceeded to the academic evaluation.
      </li>
      <li>
       80 students were selected.
      </li>
      <li>
       16 students were proposed for the Erasmus Mundus scholarships.
      </li>
      <li>
       27 students were proposed for the other scholarships (
       <a href="https://haic.fi/scholarships/" rel="noopener" target="_blank">
        HAIC scholarships
       </a>
       /SECCLO Consortium scholarships).
      </li>
     </ul>
     <p>
      There was no second application round for the 2024 student intake.
     </p>
     <h3>
      2023 student intake
     </h3>
     <h4>
      First application round (23 November 2022 – 4 January 2023)
     </h4>
     <ul>
      <li>
       A total of 821 online applications were submitted before the application deadline.
      </li>
      <li>
       Out of them, 568 applications were eligible and proceeded to the academic evaluation.
      </li>
      <li>
       81 students were selected.
      </li>
      <li>
       23 students were proposed for the Erasmus Mundus scholarships.
      </li>
      <li>
       9 students were proposed for the other scholarships (
       <a href="https://haic.fi/scholarships/" rel="noopener" target="_blank">
        HAIC scholarships
       </a>
       /NTNU/SECCLO Consortium scholarships).
      </li>
     </ul>
     <p>
      There was no second application round for the 2023 student intake.
     </p>
     <h3>
      2022 student intake
     </h3>
     <h4>
      First application round (24 November 2021 – 5 January 2022)
     </h4>
     <ul>
      <li>
       A total of 735 online applications were submitted before the application deadline.
      </li>
      <li>
       Out of them, 487 applications were eligible and proceeded to the academic evaluation.
      </li>
      <li>
       76 students were selected.
      </li>
      <li>
       26 students were proposed for the Erasmus Mundus scholarships.
      </li>
      <li>
       7 students were proposed for the other scholarships (
       <a href="https://haic.fi/scholarships/" rel="noopener" target="_blank">
        HAIC scholarships
       </a>
       /NTNU/SECCLO Consortium scholarships).
      </li>
     </ul>
     <h4>
      Second application round (30 March – 20 April 2022)
     </h4>
     <ul>
      <li>
       A total of 32 online applications were submitted before the application deadline.
      </li>
      <li>
       Out of them, 20 applicants were eligible and proceeded to the academic evaluation.
      </li>
      <li>
       1 student was selected
      </li>
     </ul>
     <h3>
      2021 student intake
     </h3>
     <h4>
      First application round (23 November 2020 – 8 January 2021)
     </h4>
     <ul>
      <li>
       A total of 542 online applications were submitted before the application deadline.
      </li>
      <li>
       Out of them, 430 applications were eligible and proceeded to the academic evaluation.
      </li>
      <li>
       76 students were selected.
      </li>
      <li>
       19 students were proposed for the Erasmus Mundus scholarships.
      </li>
      <li>
       8 students were proposed for the other scholarships (
       <a href="https://haic.fi/scholarships/" rel="noopener" target="_blank">
        HAIC scholarships
       </a>
       /NTNU/SECCLO Consortium scholarships).
      </li>
     </ul>
     <h4>
      Second application round (30 March – 21 April 2021)
     </h4>
     <ul>
      <li>
       A total of 49 online applications were submitted before the application deadline.
      </li>
      <li>
       Out of them, 31 applicants were eligible and proceeded to the academic evaluation.
      </li>
      <li>
       5 students were selected.
      </li>
      <li>
       3 students were proposed for the other scholarships (
       <a href="https://haic.fi/scholarships/" rel="noopener" target="_blank">
        HAIC scholarships
       </a>
       /SECCLO Consortium scholarships).
      </li>
     </ul>
     <h3>
      2020 student intake
     </h3>
     <h4>
      First application round (25 November 2019 – 10 January 2020)
     </h4>
     <ul>
      <li>
       A total of 506 online applications were submitted before the application deadline.

  <style type="text/css">
   /* HEADINGS ETC. */
		a,
		.container-fluid h1, 
		.container-fluid h2, 
		.container-fluid h3, 
		.container-fluid h4, 
		.container-fluid h5 {
			color:#ffffff !important;
		}
		a:hover,a:active {
			color:#f7f7f7;
		}
		.section-title {
			border-bottom: 2px solid #ffffff;
		}
		.subheader {
			color:#f7f7f7		}

		/* HEADER */
		.header-sub {
            background: linear-gradient(90deg, #ffffff 10%, #ffffff 90%);   
		}
		.header-mob {
	       background: linear-gradient(90deg, #ffffff 10%, #ffffff 90%); 
		}
		
		/* PARTNERS */
		.partners {
            background: linear-gradient(90deg, #ffffff 10%, #ffffff 90%);			
		}
		.partners h2, 
		.partners h3, 
		.partners h4, 
		.partners h5 {
			color:#00c1d5;
			border-color:#00c1d5;
		} 
		.partners.white_bg {
			background:#fff;
		}
		.partners.white_bg h2, 
		.partners.white_bg h3, 
		.partners.white_bg h4, 
		.partners.white_bg h5 {
			color: #ffffff;
			border-color: #ffffff;
		}
		/* GRADIENT BLOCKS */
		.gradient-bg {
			background: linear-gradient(90deg, #ffffff 10%, #ffffff 90%);
			color:#fff;
		}
		.gradient-bg h1,
		.gradient-bg h2,
		.gradient-bg h3, 
		.gradient-bg h4,
		.gradient-bg h5,
		.gradient-bg a {
			color:#00c1d5;
			border-color:#00c1d5;
		}
		.gradient-bg .btn {
			color: #00c1d5;
			border: 2px solid #00c1d5;
		}

		/* HERO */
		.hero {
			background-image: url('../img/glider.jpg');
		}
		.hero-content h1, 
		.hero-content a, 
		.hero-content-mob h1 {
			color:#00c1d5 !important; 
		}
		.hero-content-mob p {
			color:#00c1d5;
		}
		.hero-content {
			color:#00c1d5;
		}
		.hero-content .btn, 
		.hero-content-mob .btn {
			border:2px solid #00c1d5;
			color:#00c1d5 !important;

		}
		.navbar-header a {
			color: #00c1d5; 
		}
		.hero .copyright {
			color: #f0f0f0;
		}
		.hero-content-wrapper {
			background: rgba(255,255,255,0.6);
		}
		.hero-content-mob {
			background: linear-gradient(75deg, #ffffff 10%, #ffffff 90%);   
		}

		/* NAV */
		.container-fluid .nav>li>a:hover, 
		.container-fluid .nav>li>a:focus,
		.container-fluid .nav li a:hover, 
		.container-fluid .nav li a:active, 
		.nav li a:focus {
			background:rgba(255,255,255,0.2);
		}
		.icon-bar {
			background: #00c1d5;
		}
		.top-nav {
			background: #f7f7f7;
		}
		.container-fluid .nav .open>a,
		.container-fluid .nav .open>a:hover,
		.container-fluid .nav .open>a:focus {
			background:rgba(255,255,255,0.2);
		}
		.top-nav .nav li a,
		.top-nav .navbar-brand {
			color:#00c1d5 !important;

		}
		.top-nav .container-fluid .nav li a:hover {
			color:#00c1d5;
		}
		.top-nav .dropdown-menu .active a,
		.top-nav .dropdown-menu .active a:hover {
			background: #efefef;
		}
		.dropdown-menu, .dropdown-menu li:active,
		.dropdown-menu li.current-menu-item,
		.dropdown-menu, .dropdown-menu li {
			background: #efefef;
		}
		.top-nav .dropdown-menu li a:hover,
		.top-nav .dropdown-menu li:active a:hover {
			color:#00c1d5 !important;
		}

		.btn.btn-primary {
			background-color:#ffffff;
			color:#00c1d5 !important;
		}
		.btn.btn-primary:hover {
			background-color:#f7f7f7;
		}
		footer {
			background: #00c1d5;
		}
		.nav .open a {
			background: #f7f7f7;
		}
		@media only screen and (max-width: 767px) {

			.top-nav .dropdown-menu {
				background: #efefef;
			}
			.top-nav .dropdown-menu li a {
				background:transparent;
			}
		}

		/* Product title */
		.product-title__secondary-title {
			color: #ffffff;
		}
  </style>

     <h2>
      Scholarship and fees
     </h2>
     <div class="subheader">
      <p>
       Applicants can apply for the available scholarships when they apply to the SECCLO programme. All applicants who have applied for the scholarships are considered for them. The competitive allocation of scholarships is based on academic merit.
      </p>
     </div>
     <h3>
      Erasmus Mundus scholarship grants
     </h3>
     <table border="1" cellpadding="1" cellspacing="1">
      <thead style="background: #00c1d5;">
       <tr>
        <td>
        </td>
        <td style="text-align: center;">
         <span style="color: #ffffff;">
          <strong>
           Students from programme countries
          </strong>
         </span>
        </td>
        <td style="text-align: center;">
         <span style="color: #ffffff;">
          <strong>
           Students from partner countries
          </strong>
         </span>
        </td>
       </tr>
      </thead>
      <tbody>
       <tr>
        <td>
         Contribution to participation costs
        </td>
        <td style="text-align: center;">
         €3000/year
        </td>
        <td style="text-align: center;">
         €9000/year
        </td>
       </tr>
       <tr>
        <td>
         Contribution to travel and installation costs*
        </td>
        <td style="text-align: center;">
         €1000/year if resident in a programme country
         <p>
          €2000/year + €1000 if resident in a partner country less than 4000 km from Espoo, Finland
         </p>
         <p>
          €3000/year + €1000 if resident in a partner country 4000 km or more from Espoo, Finland
         </p>
        </td>
        <td style="text-align: center;">
         €1000/year if resident in a programme country
         <p>
          €2000/year + €1000 if resident in a partner country less than 4000 km from Espoo, Finland
         </p>
         <p>
          €3000/year + €1000 if resident in a partner country 4000 km or more from Espoo, Finland
         </p>
        </td>
       </tr>
       <tr>
        <td>
         Contribution to subsistence costs (maximum of 24 months)
        </td>
        <td style="text-align: center;">
         €1000/month
        </td>
        <td style="text-align: center;">
         €1000/month
        </td>
       </tr>
       <tr>
        <td>
        </td>
        <td style="text-align: center;">
         <strong>
          €32000-€37000
         </strong>
        </td>
        <td style="text-align: center;">
         <strong>
          €44000-€49000
         </strong>
        </td>
       </tr>
      </tbody>
     </table>
     <pre class="image_text"><strong>Programme countries</strong> are: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, former Yugoslav Republic of Macedonia, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Serbia, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Turkey, United Kingdom.
<strong>Partner countries</strong> are all countries not listed in the programme countries.
<strong>*) Travel and installation costs</strong> depend on the place of residence at the time of applying. See <a href="https://erasmus-plus.ec.europa.eu/resources-and-tools/distance-calculator" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">distance calculator</a>.</pre>
     <p>
      Applicants will be considered as either partner or programme country students as follows:
     </p>
     <ul>
      <li>
       <em>
        Partner country students
       </em>
       <ul>
        <li>
         citizens of partner countries who have
         <strong>
          not
         </strong>
         carried out their main activity (studies, training or work) for more than a total of 12 months over the last five years in a programme country.
        </li>
       </ul>
      </li>
      <li>
       <em>
        Programme country students
       </em>
       <ul>
        <li>
         citizens of programme countries.
        </li>
        <li>
         citizens of partner countries who have carried out their main activity for more than a total of 12 months over the last five years in a programme country.
        </li>
       </ul>
      </li>
     </ul>

     <p>
     </p>
     <details>
      <summary>
       <strong>
        Further rules concerning Erasmus Mundus Scholarships (click to open)
       </strong>
      </summary>
      <ul>
       <li>
        Students with a double nationality (of a partner and of a programme country) must specify the nationality under which they submit their scholarship application.
       </li>
       <li>
        Students who have already obtained an EMJMD scholarship or are former Erasmus Mundus Master/Doctoral scholarship holders are not eligible for an additional scholarship under the EMJMD action. Students benefiting from an EMJMD scholarship cannot benefit from another EU grant while pursuing their EMJMD studies.
       </li>
       <li>
        Scholarship holders spending part of the EMJMD course in their country of residence are not entitled to benefit from the monthly subsistence allowance for this period.
       </li>
       <li>
        The monthly subsistence allowance is not given to scholarship holders from a partner country for the EMJMD periods exceeding three months spent in any partner country (for example, thesis preparation, internship).
       </li>
      </ul>
     </details>
     <p>
     </p>

        The applicant is informed about the scholarship decision when the selection results are published. There will be a reserve list for the Erasmus Mundus scholarships. If selected without a scholarship, the student can join SECCLO with their

     <h3>
      Participation costs
     </h3>
     <table border="1" cellpadding="1" cellspacing="1">
      <thead style="background: #00c1d5;">
       <tr>
        <td>
        </td>

        </td>
       </tr>
      </thead>
      <tbody>
       <tr>
        <td>
         Participation cost
        </td>
        <td>
         €3000/year
        </td>
        <td>
         €9000/year
        </td>
       </tr>
      </tbody>
     </table>
     <pre class="image_text"><strong>Programme countries</strong> are: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, former Yugoslav Republic of Macedonia, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Serbia, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Turkey, United Kingdom.
<strong>Partner countries</strong> are all countries not listed in the programme countries.
</pre>
     <h4>
      What is included in the participation cost?
     </h4>
     <ul>
      <li>
       <strong>
        tuition fees
       </strong>
       : educational expenses such as courses, academic supervision, exams, counselling and university support services such as student services, use of library services and use of IT services in accordance with university regulations and policy concerning degree studies.
      </li>
      <li>
       <strong>
        insurance
       </strong>
       : including accident and health insurance satisfying the minimum requirements as published by the EACEA in its guidelines for Erasmus Mundus Joint Master Degrees.
      </li>
      <li>
       <strong>
        compulsory summer school participation
       </strong>
       : travel and accommodation costs.
      </li>
     </ul>
     <h4>
      What is NOT included in the participation cost?
     </h4>
     <ul>
      <li>
       travel from and to the original country of residence
      </li>
      <li>
       visa and residence permit related costs
      </li>
      <li>
       travel between SECCLO consortium countries and universities
      </li>
      <li>
       possible travel costs to internship positions or summer job positions, travel costs to thesis positions, if applicable
      </li>
      <li>
       accommodation and personal living expenses
      </li>
      <li>
       textbooks, personal computers, printers or study materials the student decides to purchase
      </li>
     </ul>
     <p>
      any other compulsory or voluntary local costs that may be charged according to the university rules (e.g. student union fees, casing of thesis) or national legislation. For Aalto University, the compulsory Student Union fee is currently €116 for the academic year.
     </p>

          and citizens of Iceland, Liechtenstein, Macedonia, Norway, Serbia, and Turkey.

   /* HEADINGS ETC. */
		a,
		.container-fluid h1, 
		.container-fluid h2, 
		.container-fluid h3, 
		.container-fluid h4, 
		.container-fluid h5 {
			color:#ffffff !important;
		}
		a:hover,a:active {
			color:#f7f7f7;
		}
		.section-title {
			border-bottom: 2px solid #ffffff;
		}
		.subheader {
			color:#f7f7f7		}

		/* HEADER */
		.header-sub {
            background: linear-gradient(90deg, #ffffff 10%, #ffffff 90%);   
		}
		.header-mob {
	       background: linear-gradient(90deg, #ffffff 10%, #ffffff 90%); 
		}
		
		/* PARTNERS */
		.partners {
            background: linear-gradient(90deg, #ffffff 10%, #ffffff 90%);			
		}
		.partners h2, 
		.partners h3, 
		.partners h4, 
		.partners h5 {
			color:#00c1d5;
			border-color:#00c1d5;
		} 
		.partners.white_bg {
			background:#fff;
		}
		.partners.white_bg h2, 
		.partners.white_bg h3, 
		.partners.white_bg h4, 
		.partners.white_bg h5 {
			color: #ffffff;
			border-color: #ffffff;
		}
		/* GRADIENT BLOCKS */
		.gradient-bg {
			background: linear-gradient(90deg, #ffffff 10%, #ffffff 90%);
			color:#fff;
		}
		.gradient-bg h1,
		.gradient-bg h2,
		.gradient-bg h3, 
		.gradient-bg h4,
		.gradient-bg h5,
		.gradient-bg a {
			color:#00c1d5;
			border-color:#00c1d5;
		}
		.gradient-bg .btn {
			color: #00c1d5;
			border: 2px solid #00c1d5;
		}

		/* HERO */
		.hero {
			background-image: url('../img/glider.jpg');
		}
		.hero-content h1, 
		.hero-content a, 
		.hero-content-mob h1 {
			color:#00c1d5 !important; 
		}
		.hero-content-mob p {
			color:#00c1d5;
		}
		.hero-content {
			color:#00c1d5;
		}
		.hero-content .btn, 
		.hero-content-mob .btn {
			border:2px solid #00c1d5;
			color:#00c1d5 !important;

		}
		.navbar-header a {
			color: #00c1d5; 
		}
		.hero .copyright {
			color: #f0f0f0;
		}
		.hero-content-wrapper {
			background: rgba(255,255,255,0.6);
		}
		.hero-content-mob {
			background: linear-gradient(75deg, #ffffff 10%, #ffffff 90%);   
		}

		/* NAV */
		.container-fluid .nav>li>a:hover, 
		.container-fluid .nav>li>a:focus,
		.container-fluid .nav li a:hover, 
		.container-fluid .nav li a:active, 
		.nav li a:focus {
			background:rgba(255,255,255,0.2);
		}
		.icon-bar {
			background: #00c1d5;
		}
		.top-nav {
			background: #f7f7f7;
		}
		.container-fluid .nav .open>a,
		.container-fluid .nav .open>a:hover,
		.container-fluid .nav .open>a:focus {
			background:rgba(255,255,255,0.2);
		}
		.top-nav .nav li a,
		.top-nav .navbar-brand {
			color:#00c1d5 !important;

		}
		.top-nav .container-fluid .nav li a:hover {
			color:#00c1d5;
		}
		.top-nav .dropdown-menu .active a,
		.top-nav .dropdown-menu .active a:hover {
			background: #efefef;
		}
		.dropdown-menu, .dropdown-menu li:active,
		.dropdown-menu li.current-menu-item,
		.dropdown-menu, .dropdown-menu li {
			background: #efefef;
		}
		.top-nav .dropdown-menu li a:hover,
		.top-nav .dropdown-menu li:active a:hover {
			color:#00c1d5 !important;
		}

		.btn.btn-primary {
			background-color:#ffffff;
			color:#00c1d5 !important;
		}
		.btn.btn-primary:hover {
			background-color:#f7f7f7;
		}
		footer {
			background: #00c1d5;
		}
		.nav .open a {
			background: #f7f7f7;
		}
		@media only screen and (max-width: 767px) {

			.top-nav .dropdown-menu {
				background: #efefef;
			}
			.top-nav .dropdown-menu li a {
				background:transparent;
			}
		}

		/* Product title */
		.product-title__secondary-title {
			color: #ffffff;
		}

       <li class="page_item page-item-307">
        <a href="https://www.secclo.eu/scholarships-and-fees/scholarship-and-fees/">
         Scholarship and fees
        </a>
       </li>
       <li class="page_item page-item-145 current_page_item">
        <a aria-current="page" href="https://www.secclo.eu/scholarships-and-fees/other-funding-possibilities/">
         Other funding possibilities
        </a>
       </li>
      </ul>
     </img>
    </div>
    <div class="col-md-8 content">
     <h2>
      Other funding possibilities
     </h2>
     <div class="subheader">
      <p>
       The number of Erasmus Mundus scholarships is limited and the scholarships are only allocated to the very best applicants in each student intake. Therefore, we strongly encourage students to look for other financing and scholarship possibilities.
      </p>
     </div>
     <p>
      Applicants must ensure that they have sufficient funds to support themselves financially throughout their entire study period in the SECCLO programme. International students who cannot show proof of sufficient funds for living expenses for their period of study will not be able to obtain a student visa or residence permit. You can read more about living costs from
      <a href="https://www.secclo.eu/student-life/for-selected-students/" rel="noopener" target="_blank">
       Practical information
      </a>
      for the selected SECCLO students.
     </p>
     <p>
      You can begin your search for other funding possibilities from the links below, but note that the list is not
      <span lang="en">
       <span class="hilired">
        <span class="large">
         exhaustive and you should also look for country-specific options.
        </span>
       </span>
      </span>
     </p>
     <p>
      Please note also that the SECCLO consortium universities are not responsible for these scholarships, nor can provide more information. You should always check the details of any given funding option directly with the organisation providing the scholarship.
     </p>
     <h3>
      Erasmus+ Master Degree Loan
     </h3>
     <p>
      Students who are accepted to SECCLO as self-funded students, can consider applying for an
      <a href="http://ec.europa.eu/programmes/erasmus-plus/opportunities-for-individuals/students/erasmus-plus-master-degree-loans_en" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">
       Erasmus Mundus+ Loans
      </a>
      . Currently the scheme is available through universities and banks in Spain, France, UK and Turkey for outgoing students from these countries.
     </p>
     <h3>
      National scholarship or student loans schemes
     </h3>
     <p>
      National scholarships from the student’s home country are to be arranged independently. Examples of national scholarship or loan schemes include e.g.
     </p>
     <ul>
      <li>
       <a href="https://www.akdn.org/our-agencies/aga-khan-foundation/international-scholarship-programme" rel="noopener" target="_blank">
        Aga Khan Foundation
       </a>
       (Bangladesh, India, Pakistan, Afghanistan, Tajikistan, Kyrgyzstan, Syria, Egypt, Kenya, Tanzania, Uganda, Madagascar, Mozambique)
      </li>
      <li>
       <a href="http://www.conacyt.gob.mx/index.php/becas-y-posgrados/becas-en-el-extranjero#" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">
        CONACYT
       </a>
       (Mexico)
      </li>
      <li>
       <a href="https://www.colfuturo.org/" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">
        COLFUTURO
       </a>
       (Colombia)
      </li>
      <li>
       <a href="https://www.cybersecuritymastersdegree.org/cybersecurity-scholarships/" rel="noopener" target="_blank">
        Cybersecurity Scholarships
       </a>
       (United States)
      </li>
      <li>
       <a href="https://www.isdb.org/scholarships" rel="noopener" target="_blank">
        IsDB Scholarship Programme
       </a>
       (IsDB member countries and Muslim communities in non-member countries)
      </li>
     </ul>
     <h3>
      Other external scholarships
     </h3>
     <p>
      Information on external scholarships for tuition fee liable students
      <strong>
       not administered by Aalto University/SECCLO:
      </strong>
     </p>
     <p>
      <a href="https://www.aalto.fi/en/international-students/external-scholarships" rel="noopener" target="_blank">
       https://www.aalto.fi/en/international-students/external-scholarships
      </a>
     </p>
     <p>
     </p>
     <p>
      See the scholarship portals below for other options.
     </p>
     <h3>
      Scholarships portals, e.g.
     </h3>
     <p>
      <a href="https://www.scholarshipportal.com/" rel="noopener" target="_blank">
       scholarshipportal.com
      </a>
     </p>
     <p>
      <a href="https://www.topuniversities.com/student-info/scholarship-advice/scholarships-study-europe" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">
       topuniversities.com
      </a>
     </p>
     <p>
     </p>

			color:#00c1d5;
		}
		.hero-content .btn, 
		.hero-content-mob .btn {
			border:2px solid #00c1d5;
			color:#00c1d5 !important;

		}
		.navbar-header a {
			color: #00c1d5; 
		}
		.hero .copyright {
			color: #f0f0f0;
		}
		.hero-content-wrapper {
			background: rgba(255,255,255,0.6);
		}
		.hero-content-mob {
			background: linear-gradient(75deg, #ffffff 10%, #ffffff 90%);   
		}

		/* NAV */
		.container-fluid .nav>li>a:hover, 
		.container-fluid .nav>li>a:focus,
		.container-fluid .nav li a:hover, 
		.container-fluid .nav li a:active, 
		.nav li a:focus {
			background:rgba(255,255,255,0.2);
		}
		.icon-bar {
			background: #00c1d5;
		}
		.top-nav {
			background: #f7f7f7;
		}
		.container-fluid .nav .open>a,
		.container-fluid .nav .open>a:hover,
		.container-fluid .nav .open>a:focus {
			background:rgba(255,255,255,0.2);
		}
		.top-nav .nav li a,
		.top-nav .navbar-brand {
			color:#00c1d5 !important;

		}
		.top-nav .container-fluid .nav li a:hover {
			color:#00c1d5;
		}
		.top-nav .dropdown-menu .active a,
		.top-nav .dropdown-menu .active a:hover {
			background: #efefef;
		}
		.dropdown-menu, .dropdown-menu li:active,
		.dropdown-menu li.current-menu-item,
		.dropdown-menu, .dropdown-menu li {
			background: #efefef;
		}
		.top-nav .dropdown-menu li a:hover,
		.top-nav .dropdown-menu li:active a:hover {
			color:#00c1d5 !important;
		}

		.btn.btn-primary {
			background-color:#ffffff;
			color:#00c1d5 !important;
		}
		.btn.btn-primary:hover {
			background-color:#f7f7f7;
		}
		footer {
			background: #00c1d5;
		}
		.nav .open a {
			background: #f7f7f7;
		}
		@media only screen and (max-width: 767px) {

			.top-nav .dropdown-menu {
				background: #efefef;
			}
			.top-nav .dropdown-menu li a {
				background:transparent;
			}
		}

		/* Product title */
		.product-title__secondary-title {
			color: #ffffff;
		}

     <h2>
      Get to know SECCLO cities and countries
     </h2>
     <div class="subheader">
      <p>
       SECCLO universities are located in six countries and cities.
      </p>
     </div>
     <h3>
      Espoo, Finland (Aalto University)
     </h3>
     <p>
      Aalto University’s main campus is in Otaniemi, Espoo, a 10-minute metro ride away from Helsinki, the capital city of Finland. Otaniemi is the home of an innovative community, including all six Aalto schools, several companies, start-ups and research organizations, restaurants, shops, hobbies and student housing facilities. Espoo and Helsinki, two of the largest cities in Finland, are surrounded by the sea and great green urban areas while boasting the best public transport system in the world.
     </p>
     <p>
      <a href="https://www.aalto.fi/en/study-at-aalto/student-life" rel="noopener" target="_blank">
       Student life in Otaniemi
      </a>
      <br/>
      <a href="https://www.visitespoo.fi/en/" rel="noopener" target="_blank">
       Visit Espoo
      </a>
      <br/>
      <a href="https://www.myhelsinki.fi/en/your-local-guide-to-helsinki" rel="noopener" target="_blank">
       My Helsinki
      </a>
      <br/>
      <a href="https://www.visitfinland.com/" rel="noopener" target="_blank">
       Visit Finland
      </a>
     </p>
     <pre><img alt="" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-4549" data-pagespeed-url-hash="3736883230" decoding="async" height="100%" onload="pagespeed.CriticalImages.checkImageForCriticality(this);" sizes="(max-width: 1024px) 100vw, 1024px" src="https://storage.googleapis.com/secclo-production/2020/10/85ed4422-helsinki-from-above-jussi-hellsten_5864.jpg" srcset="https://storage.googleapis.com/secclo-production/2020/10/85ed4422-helsinki-from-above-jussi-hellsten_5864.jpg 1024w, https://storage.googleapis.com/secclo-production/2020/10/85ed4422-helsinki-from-above-jussi-hellsten_5864-300x200.jpg 300w, https://storage.googleapis.com/secclo-production/2020/10/85ed4422-helsinki-from-above-jussi-hellsten_5864-768x512.jpg 768w, https://storage.googleapis.com/secclo-production/2020/10/85ed4422-helsinki-from-above-jussi-hellsten_5864-700x466.jpg 700w, https://storage.googleapis.com/secclo-production/2020/10/85ed4422-helsinki-from-above-jussi-hellsten_5864-640x426.jpg 640w" width="100%"/>Helsinki from above, Photo: Jussi Hellsten/Helsinki Marketing</pre>
     <p>
     </p>
     <h3>
      Stockholm, Sweden (KTH)
     </h3>
     <p>
      KTH’s School of Electrical Engineering and Computer Science is located in Stockholm, the capital city of Sweden. The campus in Kista sits in the heart of Kista Science City, the largest ICT cluster in Europe and home to over 1,000 ICT companies such as Ericsson, IBM and Microsoft. Stockholm, a modern city with 2.1 million inhabitants, is situated on the east coast of Sweden. It is a city sitting on 14 islands connected by 57 bridges!
     </p>
     <p>
      <a href="https://www.kth.se/en/studies/master/general/why-kth/stockholm-sweden-1.62951" rel="noopener" target="_blank">
       Student life in Stockholm
      </a>
      <br/>
      <a href="https://www.visitstockholm.com/" rel="noopener" target="_blank">
       Visit Stockholm
      </a>
      <br/>
      <a href="https://visitsweden.com/" rel="noopener" target="_blank">
       Visit Sweden
      </a>
     </p>
     <pre><img alt="" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-4555" data-pagespeed-url-hash="1463281366" decoding="async" height="100%" loading="lazy" onload="pagespeed.CriticalImages.checkImageForCriticality(this);" sizes="(max-width: 1024px) 100vw, 1024px" src="https://storage.googleapis.com/secclo-production/2020/10/24bc6327-stockholm_view_from_djurgarden_archipelago_boat_photo_jeppe_wikstrom.jpg" srcset="https://storage.googleapis.com/secclo-production/2020/10/24bc6327-stockholm_view_from_djurgarden_archipelago_boat_photo_jeppe_wikstrom.jpg 1024w, https://storage.googleapis.com/secclo-production/2020/10/24bc6327-stockholm_view_from_djurgarden_archipelago_boat_photo_jeppe_wikstrom-300x200.jpg 300w, https://storage.googleapis.com/secclo-production/2020/10/24bc6327-stockholm_view_from_djurgarden_archipelago_boat_photo_jeppe_wikstrom-768x511.jpg 768w, https://storage.googleapis.com/secclo-production/2020/10/24bc6327-stockholm_view_from_djurgarden_archipelago_boat_photo_jeppe_wikstrom-700x466.jpg 700w, https://storage.googleapis.com/secclo-production/2020/10/24bc6327-stockholm_view_from_djurgarden_archipelago_boat_photo_jeppe_wikstrom-640x426.jpg 640w" width="100%"/>View from Djurgården, Photo: Jeppe Wikström/mediabank.visitstockholm.com</pre>
     <p>
     </p>
     <h3>
      Trondheim, Norway (NTNU)
     </h3>
     <p>
      The city of Trondheim in Central Norway, the third largest city in Norway, is well known as a top location for students and academics, and the city is regularly rated as the best student town in Norway. Out of its total population of 190 000, 36 000 are university students. In Trondheim, you are surrounded by amazing nature, and hiking and skiing are popular past-time activities.
     </p>
     <p>
      <a href="https://www.ntnu.edu/lifeandhousing/trondheim/student-life" rel="noopener" target="_blank">
       Student life in Trondheim
      </a>
      <br/>
      <a href="https://www.visittrondheim.no/" rel="noopener" target="_blank">
       Visit Trondheim
      </a>
      <br/>
      <a href="https://www.visitnorway.com/" rel="noopener" target="_blank">
       Visit Norway
      </a>
     </p>
     <pre><img alt="" class="size-full wp-image-4558" data-pagespeed-url-hash="2328531242" decoding="async" height="100%" loading="lazy" onload="pagespeed.CriticalImages.checkImageForCriticality(this);" sizes="(max-width: 1024px) 100vw, 1024px" src="https://storage.googleapis.com/secclo-production/2020/10/24e32eb7-trondheim_geir-hageskal.jpg" srcset="https://storage.googleapis.com/secclo-production/2020/10/24e32eb7-trondheim_geir-hageskal.jpg 1024w, https://storage.googleapis.com/secclo-production/2020/10/24e32eb7-trondheim_geir-hageskal-300x200.jpg 300w, https://storage.googleapis.com/secclo-production/2020/10/24e32eb7-trondheim_geir-hageskal-768x512.jpg 768w, https://storage.googleapis.com/secclo-production/2020/10/24e32eb7-trondheim_geir-hageskal-700x466.jpg 700w, https://storage.googleapis.com/secclo-production/2020/10/24e32eb7-trondheim_geir-hageskal-640x426.jpg 640w" width="100%"/>Trondheim from Gamle Bybro, Photo: Geir Hageskal</pre>
     <p>
     </p>
     <h3>
      Copenhagen, Denmark (DTU)
     </h3>
     <p>
      DTU’s main campus is located in Lyngby, about 15 km north of Copenhagen. DTU Lyngby Campus has several student canteens, a library, a bookstore, and unique student facilities such as DTU Skylab. The capital of Denmark, Copenhagen, is famed for being one of the world’s most liveable cities. With a population of just below 1.3 million people Copenhagen is a metropolis on the human scale, engineered for pedestrians, pedal power, and urban living.
     </p>
     <p>
      <a href="https://www.dtu.dk/english/Education/Student-Guide/Student-life" rel="noopener" target="_blank">
       Student life at DTU
      </a>
      <br/>
      <a href="https://www.visitcopenhagen.com/" rel="noopener" target="_blank">
       Visit Copenhagen
      </a>
      <br/>
      <a href="https://www.visitdenmark.com/" rel="noopener" target="_blank">
       Visit Denmark
      </a>
     </p>
     <pre><img alt="" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-4561" data-pagespeed-url-hash="1447494232" decoding="async" height="100%" loading="lazy" onload="pagespeed.CriticalImages.checkImageForCriticality(this);" sizes="(max-width: 1024px) 100vw, 1024px" src="https://storage.googleapis.com/secclo-production/2020/10/d9909a99-copenhagen_thomas-rousing.jpg" srcset="https://storage.googleapis.com/secclo-production/2020/10/d9909a99-copenhagen_thomas-rousing.jpg 1024w, https://storage.googleapis.com/secclo-production/2020/10/d9909a99-copenhagen_thomas-rousing-300x200.jpg 300w, https://storage.googleapis.com/secclo-production/2020/10/d9909a99-copenhagen_thomas-rousing-768x512.jpg 768w, https://storage.googleapis.com/secclo-production/2020/10/d9909a99-copenhagen_thomas-rousing-700x466.jpg 700w, https://storage.googleapis.com/secclo-production/2020/10/d9909a99-copenhagen_thomas-rousing-640x426.jpg 640w" width="100%"/>Bikes in Copenhagen, Photo: Thomas Rousing/Copenhagen Media Center</pre>
     <p>
     </p>
     <h3>
      Tartu, Estonia (University of Tartu)
     </h3>
     <p>
      Tartu is situated in Southern Estonia with distance to Tallinn, Estonia’s capital, a little under 200 kilometres. The city successfully combines modern infrastructure and facilities with a green, affordable and friendly environment. An inseparable part of the city is its students who comprise around a quarter of the population and generate a lot of fun and energy. There is a lively cultural scene with something for every taste as exciting events and festivals take place all year round.
     </p>
     <p>
      <a href="https://ut.ee/en/getting-started-international-students" rel="noopener" target="_blank">
       Student life in Tartu
      </a>
      <br/>
      <a href="https://visittartu.com/" rel="noopener" target="_blank">
       Visit Tartu
      </a>
      <br/>
      <a href="https://www.visitestonia.com/en/" rel="noopener" target="_blank">
       Visit Estonia
      </a>
     </p>
     <pre><img alt="" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-4567" data-pagespeed-url-hash="1887577020" decoding="async" height="100%" loading="lazy" onload="pagespeed.CriticalImages.checkImageForCriticality(this);" sizes="(max-width: 1024px) 100vw, 1024px" src="https://storage.googleapis.com/secclo-production/2020/10/6295fb43-tartu-town-hall2_riina-varol.jpg" srcset="https://storage.googleapis.com/secclo-production/2020/10/6295fb43-tartu-town-hall2_riina-varol.jpg 1024w, https://storage.googleapis.com/secclo-production/2020/10/6295fb43-tartu-town-hall2_riina-varol-300x200.jpg 300w, https://storage.googleapis.com/secclo-production/2020/10/6295fb43-tartu-town-hall2_riina-varol-768x512.jpg 768w, https://storage.googleapis.com/secclo-production/2020/10/6295fb43-tartu-town-hall2_riina-varol-700x466.jpg 700w, https://storage.googleapis.com/secclo-production/2020/10/6295fb43-tartu-town-hall2_riina-varol-640x426.jpg 640w" width="100%"/>Tartu Town Hall, Photo: Riina Varol</pre>
     <p>
     </p>
     <h3>
      Sophia Antipolis, France (EURECOM)
     </h3>
     <p>
      The EURECOM campus is located in the Sophia Antipolis technology park, halfway between Nice and Cannes in Southern France. Sophia Antipolis is Europe’s largest and permanently expanding science and technology park, with 1 450 establishments and 31 000 jobs. Because EURECOM is a small, highly specialized university, it offers personalized support at every step of a student’s life and excellent professor/student ratio (1 professor to 8 students). Moreover, its location in French Riviera means close proximity to both Mediterranian Sea and Southern Alps, while enjoying 300 days of sun a year.
     </p>
     <p>
      <a href="http://www.eurecom.fr/en/student-life-0" rel="noopener" target="_blank">
       Student life at EURECOM
      </a>
      <br/>
      <a href="https://en.nicetourisme.com/" rel="noopener" target="_blank">
       Visit Côte d’Azur/Nice
      </a>
      <br/>
      <a href="http://ee.france.fr/" rel="noopener" target="_blank">
       Visit France
      </a>
     </p>
     <pre><img alt="" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-4570" data-pagespeed-url-hash="2963240700" decoding="async" height="100%" loading="lazy" onload="pagespeed.CriticalImages.checkImageForCriticality(this);" sizes="(max-width: 1024px) 100vw, 1024px" src="https://storage.googleapis.com/secclo-production/2020/10/21edabda-photos-i-love-nice-2019.jpg" srcset="https://storage.googleapis.com/secclo-production/2020/10/21edabda-photos-i-love-nice-2019.jpg 1024w, https://storage.googleapis.com/secclo-production/2020/10/21edabda-photos-i-love-nice-2019-300x225.jpg 300w, https://storage.googleapis.com/secclo-production/2020/10/21edabda-photos-i-love-nice-2019-768x576.jpg 768w, https://storage.googleapis.com/secclo-production/2020/10/21edabda-photos-i-love-nice-2019-700x525.jpg 700w, https://storage.googleapis.com/secclo-production/2020/10/21edabda-photos-i-love-nice-2019-640x480.jpg 640w" width="100%"/>EURECOM students in Nice, Photo: unknown</pre>

   /* HEADINGS ETC. */
		a,
		.container-fluid h1, 
		.container-fluid h2, 
		.container-fluid h3, 
		.container-fluid h4, 
		.container-fluid h5 {
			color:#ffffff !important;
		}
		a:hover,a:active {
			color:#f7f7f7;
		}
		.section-title {
			border-bottom: 2px solid #ffffff;
		}
		.subheader {
			color:#f7f7f7		}

		/* HEADER */
		.header-sub {
            background: linear-gradient(90deg, #ffffff 10%, #ffffff 90%);   
		}
		.header-mob {
	       background: linear-gradient(90deg, #ffffff 10%, #ffffff 90%); 
		}
		
		/* PARTNERS */
		.partners {
            background: linear-gradient(90deg, #ffffff 10%, #ffffff 90%);			
		}
		.partners h2, 
		.partners h3, 
		.partners h4, 
		.partners h5 {
			color:#00c1d5;
			border-color:#00c1d5;
		} 
		.partners.white_bg {
			background:#fff;
		}
		.partners.white_bg h2, 
		.partners.white_bg h3, 
		.partners.white_bg h4, 
		.partners.white_bg h5 {
			color: #ffffff;
			border-color: #ffffff;
		}
		/* GRADIENT BLOCKS */
		.gradient-bg {
			background: linear-gradient(90deg, #ffffff 10%, #ffffff 90%);
			color:#fff;
		}
		.gradient-bg h1,
		.gradient-bg h2,
		.gradient-bg h3, 
		.gradient-bg h4,
		.gradient-bg h5,
		.gradient-bg a {
			color:#00c1d5;
			border-color:#00c1d5;
		}
		.gradient-bg .btn {
			color: #00c1d5;
			border: 2px solid #00c1d5;
		}

		/* HERO */
		.hero {
			background-image: url('../img/glider.jpg');
		}
		.hero-content h1, 
		.hero-content a, 
		.hero-content-mob h1 {
			color:#00c1d5 !important; 
		}
		.hero-content-mob p {
			color:#00c1d5;
		}
		.hero-content {
			color:#00c1d5;
		}
		.hero-content .btn, 
		.hero-content-mob .btn {
			border:2px solid #00c1d5;
			color:#00c1d5 !important;

		}
		.navbar-header a {
			color: #00c1d5; 
		}
		.hero .copyright {
			color: #f0f0f0;
		}
		.hero-content-wrapper {
			background: rgba(255,255,255,0.6);
		}
		.hero-content-mob {
			background: linear-gradient(75deg, #ffffff 10%, #ffffff 90%);   
		}

		/* NAV */
		.container-fluid .nav>li>a:hover, 
		.container-fluid .nav>li>a:focus,
		.container-fluid .nav li a:hover, 
		.container-fluid .nav li a:active, 
		.nav li a:focus {
			background:rgba(255,255,255,0.2);
		}
		.icon-bar {
			background: #00c1d5;
		}
		.top-nav {
			background: #f7f7f7;
		}
		.container-fluid .nav .open>a,
		.container-fluid .nav .open>a:hover,
		.container-fluid .nav .open>a:focus {
			background:rgba(255,255,255,0.2);
		}
		.top-nav .nav li a,
		.top-nav .navbar-brand {
			color:#00c1d5 !important;

		}
		.top-nav .container-fluid .nav li a:hover {
			color:#00c1d5;
		}
		.top-nav .dropdown-menu .active a,
		.top-nav .dropdown-menu .active a:hover {
			background: #efefef;
		}
		.dropdown-menu, .dropdown-menu li:active,
		.dropdown-menu li.current-menu-item,
		.dropdown-menu, .dropdown-menu li {
			background: #efefef;
		}
		.top-nav .dropdown-menu li a:hover,
		.top-nav .dropdown-menu li:active a:hover {
			color:#00c1d5 !important;
		}

		.btn.btn-primary {
			background-color:#ffffff;
			color:#00c1d5 !important;
		}
		.btn.btn-primary:hover {
			background-color:#f7f7f7;
		}
		footer {
			background: #00c1d5;
		}
		.nav .open a {
			background: #f7f7f7;
		}
		@media only screen and (max-width: 767px) {

			.top-nav .dropdown-menu {
				background: #efefef;
			}
			.top-nav .dropdown-menu li a {
				background:transparent;
			}
		}

		/* Product title */
		.product-title__secondary-title {
			color: #ffffff;
		}
