     <h2>
      Consortium and industry partners
     </h2>
     <div class="subheader">
     </div>
     <h3>
      Consortium of six universities
     </h3>
     <p>
      The SECCLO consortium universities are renowned research and educational institutions in Europe, and among the top-ranking universities of technology in the Nordic countries. In our consortium composition, we rely strongly on the excellence of the partner universities and on their close ties to the industry in their home countries.
     </p>
     <p>
      <img alt="" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-694" data-pagespeed-url-hash="283754576" decoding="async" onload="pagespeed.CriticalImages.checkImageForCriticality(this);" sizes="(max-width: 635px) 100vw, 635px" src="https://storage.googleapis.com/secclo-production/2018/10/5fd8b3d2-konsortiokartta_epavirallinen.png" srcset="https://storage.googleapis.com/secclo-production/2018/10/5fd8b3d2-konsortiokartta_epavirallinen.png 635w, https://storage.googleapis.com/secclo-production/2018/10/5fd8b3d2-konsortiokartta_epavirallinen-300x174.png 300w" width="100%"/>
     </p>
     <p>
     </p>
     <p>
      <strong>
       1. Aalto University, Espoo, Finland (coordinator)
      </strong>
     </p>
     <p>
      <a href="https://www.aalto.fi/en" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">
       Aalto University
      </a>
      was created in 2010 through the merger of three leading Finnish universities in their own fields:
      <em>
       Helsinki University of Technology
      </em>
      ,
      <em>
       Helsinki School of Economics
      </em>
      and
      <em>
       University of Art and Design
      </em>
      . It now comprises six schools with over 19,000 students and 5,000 staff members, thus being Finland’s third-largest university. The SECCLO programme is coordinated by Aalto University School of Science and its
      <a href="https://www.aalto.fi/en/department-of-computer-science" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">
       Department of Computer Science
      </a>
      . Read about
      <a href="https://www.aalto.fi/en/aalto-university/rankings" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">
       Aalto University ranking >>
      </a>
     </p>
     <p>
      <strong>
       2. KTH, Stockholm, Sweden
      </strong>
     </p>
     <p>
      <a href="https://www.kth.se/en" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">
       KTH Royal Institute of Technology
      </a>
      is the premier research institution for communications technologies in Sweden. It collaborates actively with industry leaders such as Ericsson, IBM, Microsoft, Intel, and ABB. Founded in 1827, KTH is the oldest and largest technical university in Sweden. The
      <a href="https://www.kth.se/en/ict" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">
       School of Electrical Engineering and Computer Science
      </a>
      is offering the SECCLO second year specialization in
      <em>
       Communications Systems
      </em>
      . Read about
      <a href="https://www.kth.se/en/om/fakta/ranking" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">
       KTH ranking >>
      </a>
     </p>
     <p>
      <strong>
       3. NTNU, Trondheim, Norway
      </strong>
     </p>
     <p>
      <a href="https://www.ntnu.edu/" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">
       The Norwegian University of Science and Technology
      </a>
      (NTNU) is the largest of the eight universities in Norway and has the main national responsibility for higher education in engineering and technology. The
      <a href="https://www.ntnu.edu/iik" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">
       Department of Information Security and Communication Technology
      </a>
      conducts internationally competitive research in several areas of cyber security, information security, communication networks and networked services. NTNU specialisation in SECCLO is
      <em>
       Information Security
      </em>
      .
      <a href="http://www.ntnu.edu/research/" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">
       Read about NTNU research >>
      </a>
     </p>
     <p>
      <strong>
       4. DTU, Copenhagen, Denmark
      </strong>
     </p>
     <p>
      <a href="http://www.dtu.dk/english" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">
       The Technical University of Denmark
      </a>
      (DTU) is Denmark’s leading centre for engineering education and research. Founded in 1829, DTU has a long tradition of collaboration with industry and public corporations as well as with internationalization of its education. In SECCLO,
      <a href="http://www.compute.dtu.dk/english" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">
       DTU Compute
      </a>
      (Department of Applied Mathematics and Computer Science) offers the second year specialization in
      <em>
       Reliable Distributed Systems
      </em>
      . Read about
      <a href="https://www.dtu.dk/english/about/facts-and-figures/rankings" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">
       DTU ranking >>
      </a>
     </p>
     <p>
      <strong>
       5. UT, Tartu, Estonia
      </strong>
     </p>
     <p>
      <a href="https://www.ut.ee/en" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">
       University of Tartu
      </a>
      , founded in 1632, is the largest and most significant higher education institution, and the only classical university in Estonia. The Estonian research activities in information security and cryptology started in mid-90s, in response to the needs of the newly independent country, and soon afterwards, teaching of cryptology and information security started in University of Tartu. The
      <a href="https://www.cs.ut.ee/en" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">
       Institute of Computer Science
      </a>
      of the UT offers the second year specialization of
      <em>
       Cryptography
      </em>
      . Read about
      <a href="https://ut.ee/en/rankings-surveys" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">
       UT ranking >>
      </a>
     </p>
     <p>
      <strong>
       6. EURECOM, Sophia Antipolis, France
      </strong>
     </p>
     <p>
      <a href="http://www.eurecom.fr/en" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">
       EURECOM
      </a>
      is a French graduate school and a research center in Digital Sciences founded in 1991 by Institut Mines-Télécom. It brings together renowned European universities with industrial partners such as Orange, BMW Group, Symantec, Monaco Telecom, SAP, IABG and the Principality of Monaco. EURECOM’s research activities are organized around three areas: Digital Security, Communication Systems, and Data Science. Its specialization in SECCLO is Big Data Security. Read about
      <a href="http://www.eurecom.fr/en/research" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">
       EURECOM research >>
      </a>
     </p>
     <h3>
      Collaboration with industry and research partners
     </h3>
     <p>
      The consortium universities are accustomed to respond to the needs of the relevant industry and there is a significant scientific and industrial cluster in this subject area. The location of many of the universities near science parks, innovation hubs, and R&D centers support various formal and informal ties between the educational institutions and industry. For example, Aalto University is located in Otaniemi knowledge hub which is home to 800 companies. EURECOM is located in Sophia-Antipolis, Europe’s largest technology park with more than 2000 companies.
     </p>
     <p>
      The
      <em>
       associate members
      </em>
      of the SECCLO programme promote the future employability of its students by offering internship and thesis positions, company visits and contributions to the course contents. The associate members are also committed to supporting the further development of the programme by nominating representatives to the SECCLO Advisory Board.
     </p>
     <p>
      The current associate members of the SECCLO programme are:
     </p>
     <ul>
      <li>
       <a href="https://www.ericsson.com/en" rel="noopener" target="_blank">
        Ericsson
       </a>
       , Finland
      </li>
      <li>
       <a href="https://www.kone.com/en/" rel="noopener" target="_blank">
        KONE Corporation
       </a>
       , Finland
      </li>
      <li>
       <a href="http://www.vttresearch.com/" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">
        VTT Technical Research Centre of Finland
       </a>
      </li>
      <li>
       <a href="https://www.intel.com/content/www/us/en/homepage.html" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">
        Intel Labs Europe
       </a>
       , Germany
      </li>
      <li>
       <a href="http://www.nokia.com/en_int" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">
        Nokia
       </a>
       , France/Finland
      </li>
      <li>
       <a href="https://cyber.ee/en/" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">
        Cybernetica AS
       </a>
       , Estonia
      </li>
      <li>
       <a href="https://guardtime.com/" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">
        GuardTime
       </a>
       , Estonia
      </li>
      <li>
       <a href="https://www.sics.se/groups/security-lab-sec" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">
        RISE – Research Institutes of Sweden, Security Lab
       </a>
      </li>
      <li>
       <a href="https://www.sap.com/corporate/en/company/innovation/sap-labs.html" rel="noopener" target="_blank">
        SAP Labs
       </a>
       , France
      </li>
      <li>
       <a href="https://www.ikerlan.es/en/" rel="noopener" target="_blank">
        IKERLAN
       </a>
       , Spain
      </li>
      <li>
       <a href="https://www.eficode.com/" rel="noopener" target="_blank">
        Eficode
       </a>
       , Finland
      </li>
      <li>
       <a href="https://www.sintef.no/en/" rel="noopener" target="_blank">
        SINTEF
       </a>
       , Norway
      </li>
      <li>
       <a href="https://www.mnemonic.no/" rel="noopener" target="_blank">
        Mnemonic
       </a>
       , Norway
      </li>
      <li>
       <a href="https://umbraco.com/">
        Umbraco
       </a>
       , Denmark
      </li>
      <li>
       <a href="https://www.insta.fi/en/en/">
        Insta
       </a>
       , Finland
      </li>
      <li>
       <a href="https://www.withsecure.com/en/home">
        WithSecure™, Finland
       </a>
      </li>
      <li>
       <a href="https://www.fraktal.fi/">
        Fraktal, Finland
       </a>
      </li>
     </ul>
     <p>
      <img alt="" class="alignnone wp-image-6057" data-pagespeed-url-hash="435147144" decoding="async" height="434" loading="lazy" onload="pagespeed.CriticalImages.checkImageForCriticality(this);" sizes="(max-width: 772px) 100vw, 772px" src="https://storage.googleapis.com/secclo-production/2022/10/fd085d32-associate-member-logo-page.jpg" srcset="https://storage.googleapis.com/secclo-production/2022/10/fd085d32-associate-member-logo-page.jpg 1280w, https://storage.googleapis.com/secclo-production/2022/10/fd085d32-associate-member-logo-page-300x169.jpg 300w, https://storage.googleapis.com/secclo-production/2022/10/fd085d32-associate-member-logo-page-768x432.jpg 768w, https://storage.googleapis.com/secclo-production/2022/10/fd085d32-associate-member-logo-page-1024x576.jpg 1024w, https://storage.googleapis.com/secclo-production/2022/10/fd085d32-associate-member-logo-page-700x394.jpg 700w, https://storage.googleapis.com/secclo-production/2022/10/fd085d32-associate-member-logo-page-640x360.jpg 640w" width="772"/>
     </p>
     <h3>
      Helsinki-Aalto Institute for Cybersecurity (HAIC)
     </h3>
     <p>
      <a href="https://haic.aalto.fi/" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">
       Helsinki-Aalto Institute for Cybersecurity
      </a>
      is a strategic initiative set up by Aalto University and the University of Helsinki in 2016 to coordinate industry-university cooperation on security education in the Helsinki area. HAIC organizes a talk series, meet-and-greet events with industry contacts and excursions to local companies. HAIC also provides industry-funded scholarships which are available to SECCLO students.
     </p>

<html class="no-js" lang="">
 <head>
  <meta charset="utf-8"/>
  <meta content="IE=edge,chrome=1" http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible"/>
  <title>
  </title>
  <meta content="" name="description"/>
  <meta content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" name="viewport"/>
  <link href="apple-touch-icon.png" rel="apple-touch-icon"/>
  <style type="text/css">
   /* HEADINGS ETC. */
		a,
		.container-fluid h1, 
		.container-fluid h2, 
		.container-fluid h3, 
		.container-fluid h4, 
		.container-fluid h5 {
			color:#ffffff !important;
		}
		a:hover,a:active {
			color:#f7f7f7;
		}
		.section-title {
			border-bottom: 2px solid #ffffff;
		}
		.subheader {
			color:#f7f7f7		}

		/* HEADER */
		.header-sub {
            background: linear-gradient(90deg, #ffffff 10%, #ffffff 90%);   
		}
		.header-mob {
	       background: linear-gradient(90deg, #ffffff 10%, #ffffff 90%); 
		}
		
		/* PARTNERS */
		.partners {
            background: linear-gradient(90deg, #ffffff 10%, #ffffff 90%);			
		}
		.partners h2, 
		.partners h3, 
		.partners h4, 
		.partners h5 {
			color:#00c1d5;
			border-color:#00c1d5;
		} 
		.partners.white_bg {
			background:#fff;
		}
		.partners.white_bg h2, 
		.partners.white_bg h3, 
		.partners.white_bg h4, 
		.partners.white_bg h5 {
			color: #ffffff;
			border-color: #ffffff;
		}
		/* GRADIENT BLOCKS */
		.gradient-bg {
			background: linear-gradient(90deg, #ffffff 10%, #ffffff 90%);
			color:#fff;
		}
		.gradient-bg h1,
		.gradient-bg h2,
		.gradient-bg h3, 
		.gradient-bg h4,
		.gradient-bg h5,
		.gradient-bg a {
			color:#00c1d5;
			border-color:#00c1d5;
		}
		.gradient-bg .btn {
			color: #00c1d5;
			border: 2px solid #00c1d5;
		}

		/* HERO */
		.hero {
			background-image: url('../img/glider.jpg');
		}
		.hero-content h1, 
		.hero-content a, 
		.hero-content-mob h1 {
			color:#00c1d5 !important; 
		}
		.hero-content-mob p {
			color:#00c1d5;
		}
		.hero-content {
			color:#00c1d5;
		}
		.hero-content .btn, 
		.hero-content-mob .btn {
			border:2px solid #00c1d5;
			color:#00c1d5 !important;

		}
		.navbar-header a {
			color: #00c1d5; 
		}
		.hero .copyright {
			color: #f0f0f0;
		}
		.hero-content-wrapper {
			background: rgba(255,255,255,0.6);
		}
		.hero-content-mob {
			background: linear-gradient(75deg, #ffffff 10%, #ffffff 90%);   
		}

		/* NAV */
		.container-fluid .nav>li>a:hover, 
		.container-fluid .nav>li>a:focus,
		.container-fluid .nav li a:hover, 
		.container-fluid .nav li a:active, 
		.nav li a:focus {
			background:rgba(255,255,255,0.2);
		}
		.icon-bar {
			background: #00c1d5;
		}
		.top-nav {
			background: #f7f7f7;
		}
		.container-fluid .nav .open>a,
		.container-fluid .nav .open>a:hover,
		.container-fluid .nav .open>a:focus {
			background:rgba(255,255,255,0.2);
		}
		.top-nav .nav li a,
		.top-nav .navbar-brand {
			color:#00c1d5 !important;

		}
		.top-nav .container-fluid .nav li a:hover {
			color:#00c1d5;
		}
		.top-nav .dropdown-menu .active a,
		.top-nav .dropdown-menu .active a:hover {
			background: #efefef;
		}
		.dropdown-menu, .dropdown-menu li:active,
		.dropdown-menu li.current-menu-item,
		.dropdown-menu, .dropdown-menu li {
			background: #efefef;
		}
		.top-nav .dropdown-menu li a:hover,
		.top-nav .dropdown-menu li:active a:hover {
			color:#00c1d5 !important;
		}

		.btn.btn-primary {
			background-color:#ffffff;
			color:#00c1d5 !important;
		}
		.btn.btn-primary:hover {
			background-color:#f7f7f7;
		}
		footer {
			background: #00c1d5;
		}
		.nav .open a {
			background: #f7f7f7;
		}
		@media only screen and (max-width: 767px) {

			.top-nav .dropdown-menu {
				background: #efefef;
			}
			.top-nav .dropdown-menu li a {
				background:transparent;
			}
		}

		/* Product title */
		.product-title__secondary-title {
			color: #ffffff;
		}
  </style>

     <h2>

     </h2>
     <div class="subheader">
      <p>
       Get some further information on current SECCLO students and get to know our academic and administrative staff.

     <h3>
      SECCLO students
     </h3>
     <p>
      The six intakes (2018-2023) of SECCLO students represent 48 nationalities:
      <em>
       Armenia, Azerbaijan, Bangladesh, Belize, China, Colombia, Denmark, Egypt, Estonia, Ethiopia, Finland, France, Germany, Guatemala, India, Indonesia, Iran, Italy, Japan, Kazakhstan, Kosovo, Lebanon, Mexico, Moldova, Montenegro, Nepal, Netherlands, Norway, Pakistan, Paraguay, Philippines, Poland, Romania, Russian Federation, Serbia, Spain, Sri Lanka, Sudan, Switzerland, Taiwan, Thailand, Turkey, Ukraine, United States, Uruguay, Uzbekistan
      </em>
      ,
      <em>
       Viet Nam
      </em>
      and
      <em>
       Yemen
      </em>
      .
     </p>

<html class="no-js" lang="">
 <head>
  <meta charset="utf-8"/>
  <meta content="IE=edge,chrome=1" http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible"/>
  <title>
  </title>
  <meta content="" name="description"/>
  <meta content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" name="viewport"/>
  <link href="apple-touch-icon.png" rel="apple-touch-icon"/>
  <style type="text/css">
   /* HEADINGS ETC. */
		a,
		.container-fluid h1, 
		.container-fluid h2, 
		.container-fluid h3, 
		.container-fluid h4, 
		.container-fluid h5 {
			color:#ffffff !important;
		}
		a:hover,a:active {
			color:#f7f7f7;
		}
		.section-title {
			border-bottom: 2px solid #ffffff;
		}
		.subheader {
			color:#f7f7f7		}

		/* HEADER */
		.header-sub {
            background: linear-gradient(90deg, #ffffff 10%, #ffffff 90%);   
		}
		.header-mob {
	       background: linear-gradient(90deg, #ffffff 10%, #ffffff 90%); 
		}
		
		/* PARTNERS */
		.partners {
            background: linear-gradient(90deg, #ffffff 10%, #ffffff 90%);			
		}
		.partners h2, 
		.partners h3, 
		.partners h4, 
		.partners h5 {
			color:#00c1d5;
			border-color:#00c1d5;
		} 
		.partners.white_bg {
			background:#fff;
		}
		.partners.white_bg h2, 
		.partners.white_bg h3, 
		.partners.white_bg h4, 
		.partners.white_bg h5 {
			color: #ffffff;
			border-color: #ffffff;
		}
		/* GRADIENT BLOCKS */
		.gradient-bg {
			background: linear-gradient(90deg, #ffffff 10%, #ffffff 90%);
			color:#fff;
		}
		.gradient-bg h1,
		.gradient-bg h2,
		.gradient-bg h3, 
		.gradient-bg h4,
		.gradient-bg h5,
		.gradient-bg a {
			color:#00c1d5;
			border-color:#00c1d5;
		}
		.gradient-bg .btn {
			color: #00c1d5;
			border: 2px solid #00c1d5;
		}

		/* HERO */
		.hero {
			background-image: url('../img/glider.jpg');
		}
		.hero-content h1, 
		.hero-content a, 
		.hero-content-mob h1 {
			color:#00c1d5 !important; 
		}
		.hero-content-mob p {
			color:#00c1d5;
		}
		.hero-content {
			color:#00c1d5;
		}
		.hero-content .btn, 
		.hero-content-mob .btn {
			border:2px solid #00c1d5;
			color:#00c1d5 !important;

		}
		.navbar-header a {
			color: #00c1d5; 
		}
		.hero .copyright {
			color: #f0f0f0;
		}
		.hero-content-wrapper {
			background: rgba(255,255,255,0.6);
		}
		.hero-content-mob {
			background: linear-gradient(75deg, #ffffff 10%, #ffffff 90%);   
		}

		/* NAV */
		.container-fluid .nav>li>a:hover, 
		.container-fluid .nav>li>a:focus,
		.container-fluid .nav li a:hover, 
		.container-fluid .nav li a:active, 
		.nav li a:focus {
			background:rgba(255,255,255,0.2);
		}
		.icon-bar {
			background: #00c1d5;
		}
		.top-nav {
			background: #f7f7f7;
		}
		.container-fluid .nav .open>a,
		.container-fluid .nav .open>a:hover,
		.container-fluid .nav .open>a:focus {
			background:rgba(255,255,255,0.2);
		}
		.top-nav .nav li a,
		.top-nav .navbar-brand {
			color:#00c1d5 !important;

		}
		.top-nav .container-fluid .nav li a:hover {
			color:#00c1d5;
		}
		.top-nav .dropdown-menu .active a,
		.top-nav .dropdown-menu .active a:hover {
			background: #efefef;
		}
		.dropdown-menu, .dropdown-menu li:active,
		.dropdown-menu li.current-menu-item,
		.dropdown-menu, .dropdown-menu li {
			background: #efefef;
		}
		.top-nav .dropdown-menu li a:hover,
		.top-nav .dropdown-menu li:active a:hover {
			color:#00c1d5 !important;
		}

		.btn.btn-primary {
			background-color:#ffffff;
			color:#00c1d5 !important;
		}
		.btn.btn-primary:hover {
			background-color:#f7f7f7;
		}
		footer {
			background: #00c1d5;
		}
		.nav .open a {
			background: #f7f7f7;
		}
		@media only screen and (max-width: 767px) {

			.top-nav .dropdown-menu {
				background: #efefef;
			}
			.top-nav .dropdown-menu li a {
				background:transparent;
			}
		}

		/* Product title */
		.product-title__secondary-title {
			color: #ffffff;
		}
  </style>

     <h2>
      Privacy notice
     </h2>
     <div class="subheader">
     </div>
     <p>
      The SECCLO programme and its consortium member universities collect and process the personal data of applicants and selected students in order to fulfill the letter of the contract between SECCLO and EACEA, for example, in order to process the SECCLO applications or to arrange teaching.
     </p>
     <p>
      Data processing may also be carried out under national legal obligations of our consortium member universities. These legal obligations include e.g. registering of study rights, enrollment to the university, and transferring studies and completed degrees to a national registry. The data can be made available to the SECCLO consortium member universities, EACEA, the European Commission, the European External Action Service staff, as well as to other stakeholders of the Erasmus+ programme, such as Erasmus+ National Agencies, National Erasmus+ Offices and the Erasmus Mundus Student and Alumni Association.
     </p>
     <p>
      <a href="https://eacea.ec.europa.eu/mobility/docs/privacy_statement_emt.pdf" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">
       EACEA Privacy statement for Processing of Personal Data collected via the EACEA Mobility Database
      </a>
      (.pdf)
     </p>
     <h4>
      Privacy notices of the consortium universities
     </h4>
     <ul>
      <li>
       <a href="https://www.aalto.fi/en/admission-services/data-privacy-notice-for-applicants" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">
        Aalto University
       </a>
      </li>
      <li>
       <a href="https://www.kth.se/en/student/studentliv/studentratt/ladok-och-offentlighetsprincipen-1.374759" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">
        KTH
       </a>
      </li>
      <li>
       <a href="https://www.ntnu.no/personvern" rel="noopener" target="_blank">
        NTNU
       </a>
       (in Norwegian)
      </li>
      <li>
       <a href="https://www.dtu.dk/english/About/ORGANIZATION/Policies/Privacy-policy" rel="noopener" target="_blank">
        DTU
       </a>
      </li>
      <li>
       <a href="https://www.ut.ee/en/data-protection-policy" rel="noopener" target="_blank">
        University of Tartu
       </a>
      </li>
      <li>
       <a href="http://www.eurecom.fr/en/legal-notice" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">
        Eurecom
       </a>
      </li>
     </ul>
     <p>
      In case you have any further questions, do not hesitate to contact the consortium universities directly or SECCLO coordinator at
      <a class="mgd_spmspn" href="mailto:secclo@aalto.fi">
       secclo@aalto.fi
      </a>
      .
     </p>

  <style type="text/css">
   /* HEADINGS ETC. */
		a,
		.container-fluid h1, 
		.container-fluid h2, 
		.container-fluid h3, 
		.container-fluid h4, 
		.container-fluid h5 {
			color:#ffffff !important;
		}
		a:hover,a:active {
			color:#f7f7f7;
		}
		.section-title {
			border-bottom: 2px solid #ffffff;
		}
		.subheader {
			color:#f7f7f7		}

		/* HEADER */
		.header-sub {
            background: linear-gradient(90deg, #ffffff 10%, #ffffff 90%);   
		}
		.header-mob {
	       background: linear-gradient(90deg, #ffffff 10%, #ffffff 90%); 
		}
		
		/* PARTNERS */
		.partners {
            background: linear-gradient(90deg, #ffffff 10%, #ffffff 90%);			
		}
		.partners h2, 
		.partners h3, 
		.partners h4, 
		.partners h5 {
			color:#00c1d5;
			border-color:#00c1d5;
		} 
		.partners.white_bg {
			background:#fff;
		}
		.partners.white_bg h2, 
		.partners.white_bg h3, 
		.partners.white_bg h4, 
		.partners.white_bg h5 {
			color: #ffffff;
			border-color: #ffffff;
		}
		/* GRADIENT BLOCKS */
		.gradient-bg {
			background: linear-gradient(90deg, #ffffff 10%, #ffffff 90%);
			color:#fff;
		}
		.gradient-bg h1,
		.gradient-bg h2,
		.gradient-bg h3, 
		.gradient-bg h4,
		.gradient-bg h5,
		.gradient-bg a {
			color:#00c1d5;
			border-color:#00c1d5;
		}
		.gradient-bg .btn {
			color: #00c1d5;
			border: 2px solid #00c1d5;
		}

		/* HERO */
		.hero {
			background-image: url('../img/glider.jpg');
		}
		.hero-content h1, 
		.hero-content a, 
		.hero-content-mob h1 {
			color:#00c1d5 !important; 
		}
		.hero-content-mob p {
			color:#00c1d5;
		}
		.hero-content {
			color:#00c1d5;
		}
		.hero-content .btn, 
		.hero-content-mob .btn {
			border:2px solid #00c1d5;
			color:#00c1d5 !important;

		}
		.navbar-header a {
			color: #00c1d5; 
		}
		.hero .copyright {
			color: #f0f0f0;
		}
		.hero-content-wrapper {
			background: rgba(255,255,255,0.6);
		}
		.hero-content-mob {
			background: linear-gradient(75deg, #ffffff 10%, #ffffff 90%);   
		}

		/* NAV */
		.container-fluid .nav>li>a:hover, 
		.container-fluid .nav>li>a:focus,
		.container-fluid .nav li a:hover, 
		.container-fluid .nav li a:active, 
		.nav li a:focus {
			background:rgba(255,255,255,0.2);
		}
		.icon-bar {
			background: #00c1d5;
		}
		.top-nav {
			background: #f7f7f7;
		}
		.container-fluid .nav .open>a,
		.container-fluid .nav .open>a:hover,
		.container-fluid .nav .open>a:focus {
			background:rgba(255,255,255,0.2);
		}
		.top-nav .nav li a,
		.top-nav .navbar-brand {
			color:#00c1d5 !important;

		}
		.top-nav .container-fluid .nav li a:hover {
			color:#00c1d5;
		}
		.top-nav .dropdown-menu .active a,
		.top-nav .dropdown-menu .active a:hover {
			background: #efefef;
		}
		.dropdown-menu, .dropdown-menu li:active,
		.dropdown-menu li.current-menu-item,
		.dropdown-menu, .dropdown-menu li {
			background: #efefef;
		}
		.top-nav .dropdown-menu li a:hover,
		.top-nav .dropdown-menu li:active a:hover {
			color:#00c1d5 !important;
		}

		.btn.btn-primary {
			background-color:#ffffff;
			color:#00c1d5 !important;
		}
		.btn.btn-primary:hover {
			background-color:#f7f7f7;
		}
		footer {
			background: #00c1d5;
		}
		.nav .open a {
			background: #f7f7f7;
		}
		@media only screen and (max-width: 767px) {

			.top-nav .dropdown-menu {
				background: #efefef;
			}
			.top-nav .dropdown-menu li a {
				background:transparent;
			}
		}

		/* Product title */
		.product-title__secondary-title {
			color: #ffffff;
		}
  </style>
